MEGAHORN.name: Megahorn
MEGAHORN.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

BUGBUZZ.name: Bug Buzz
BUGBUZZ.description: The user vibrates its wings to make a damaging sound wave. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

FIRSTIMPRESSION.name: First Impression
FIRSTIMPRESSION.description: Only works on the first turn the user is in battle. This move always goes first.

POLLENPUFF.name: Pollen Puff
POLLENPUFF.description: Fires an exploding pollen puff at enemies, or a HP-restoring one at allies.

LEECHLIFE.name: Leech Life
LEECHLIFE.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

LUNGE.name: Lunge
LUNGE.description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This lowers the target's Attack by two steps.

XSCISSOR.name: X-Scissor
XSCISSOR.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws. Critical hits twice as often.

SIGNALBEAM.name: Signal Beam
SIGNALBEAM.description: The user attacks with a beam of light. It has a 10% chance to dizzy.

UTURN.name: U-turn
UTURN.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

STEAMROLLER.name: Steamroller
STEAMROLLER.description: The user rolls over its foes, crushing them. It has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

BUGBITE.name: Bug Bite
BUGBITE.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

SILVERWIND.name: Silver Wind
SILVERWIND.description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It has a 20% chance to raise all stats.

FELLSTINGER.name: Fell Stinger
FELLSTINGER.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises by five steps.

STRUGGLEBUG.name: Struggle Bug
STRUGGLEBUG.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk is reduced by two steps.

FURYCUTTER.name: Fury Cutter
FURYCUTTER.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power doubles if it hits in succession.

PINMISSILE.name: Pin Missile
PINMISSILE.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

INFESTATION.name: Infestation
INFESTATION.description: The user summons bugs to swarm the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

DEFENDORDER.name: Defend Order
DEFENDORDER.description: The user calls its underlings to shield it, raising its defensive stats by two steps. Always goes first.

HEALORDER.name: Heal Order
HEALORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains 3/5ths of its max HP.

QUIVERDANCE.name: Quiver Dance
QUIVERDANCE.description: The user raises their Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps, and Speed by one step.

STICKYWEB.name: Sticky Web
STICKYWEB.description: Weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed by two steps upon switching in.

STRINGSHOT.name: String Shot
STRINGSHOT.description: The foe is bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the target's Speed by four steps.

TAILGLOW.name: Tail Glow
TAILGLOW.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, raising its Sp. Atk stat by five steps.

SKITTERSMACK.name: Skitter Smack
SKITTERSMACK.description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

HYPERSPACEFURY.name: Hyperspace Fury
HYPERSPACEFURY.description: Unleashes a barrage of multi-arm attacks, skipping and destroying protections. Always hits. Lowers the user's Defense by two steps.

FOULPLAY.name: Foul Play
FOULPLAY.description: Turns the foe's power against it, dealing damage using the target's Attack stat.

DARKESTLARIAT.name: Darkest Lariat
DARKESTLARIAT.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. Ignores the target's stat step changes.

CRUNCH.name: Crunch
CRUNCH.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It has a 20% chance to lower Defense.

DARKPULSE.name: Dark Pulse
DARKPULSE.description: The user releases an aura imbued with dark thoughts. It has a 40% chance to flinch the target.

THROATCHOP.name: Throat Chop
THROATCHOP.description: The user attacks the target's throat. The target cannot use sound-based moves for two turns.

NIGHTSLASH.name: Night Slash
NIGHTSLASH.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits twice as often.

SUCKERPUNCH.name: Sucker Punch
SUCKERPUNCH.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

KNOCKOFF.name: Knock Off
KNOCKOFF.description: The user slaps the target to knock off their item. If they have an item, this deals 50% more damage.

ASSURANCE.name: Assurance
ASSURANCE.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

BITE.name: Bite
BITE.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

BRUTALSWING.name: Brutal Swing
BRUTALSWING.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

FEINTATTACK.name: Feint Attack
FEINTATTACK.description: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. Can't miss and skips protections.

THIEF.name: Thief
THIEF.description: The user attacks and steals the foe's held item simultaneously. Items stolen from wild Pokémon are stored.

SNARL.name: Snarl
SNARL.description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, lowering the target's Sp. Atk by two steps.

PAYBACK.name: Payback
PAYBACK.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

PURSUIT.name: Pursuit
PURSUIT.description: Inflicts double damage on a target that is switching out.

BEATUP.name: Beat Up
BEATUP.description: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe with punches and kicks.

FLING.name: Fling
FLING.description: The user throws its held item at the target. Some items deal more damage or have extra effects.

PUNISHMENT.name: Punishment
PUNISHMENT.description: This attack's power increases by 10 for every one of the target's positive stat steps.

DARKVOID.name: Dark Void
DARKVOID.description: Targets are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep. This move always goes last.

EMBARGO.name: Embargo
EMBARGO.description: The user prevents the target from using its held item.

FAKETEARS.name: Fake Tears
FAKETEARS.description: The user feigns crying to worry the target, lowering its Sp. Def stat by four steps.

HONECLAWS.name: Hone Claws
HONECLAWS.description: The user sharpens its claws to raise its Attack and accuracy by three steps each.

PARTINGSHOT.name: Parting Shot
PARTINGSHOT.description: The user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each. Then, the user switches out.

QUASH.name: Quash
QUASH.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

SNATCH.name: Snatch
SNATCH.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the foe attempts to use.

SWITCHEROO.name: Switcheroo
SWITCHEROO.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

TAUNT.name: Taunt
TAUNT.description: The target is taunted into a rage that prevents it from using status moves for three more turns.

TOPSYTURVY.name: Topsy-Turvy
TOPSYTURVY.description: All stat step changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

TORMENT.name: Torment
TORMENT.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

JAWLOCK.name: Jaw Lock
JAWLOCK.description: Prevents the user and target from switching out until either of them faints or is switched out.

FALSESURRENDER.name: False Surrender
FALSESURRENDER.description: The user fakes the target out and stabs them with its disheveled hair. Can't miss and skips protections.

OBSTRUCT.name: Obstruct
OBSTRUCT.description: Protects the user from damage this turn. It also lowers the Defense of physical attackers by four steps.

WICKEDBLOW.name: Wicked Blow
WICKEDBLOW.description: The user strikes with a fierce blow of Dark Mastery. It always results in a critical hit.

LASHOUT.name: Lash Out
LASHOUT.description: If the user's stats were lowered during the turn, the power of this move is doubled.

FIERYWRATH.name: Fiery Wrath
FIERYWRATH.description: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. It has a 50% chance to make the target flinch.

ROAROFTIME.name: Roar of Time
ROAROFTIME.description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

DRACOMETEOR.name: Draco Meteor
DRACOMETEOR.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by four steps.

OUTRAGE.name: Outrage
OUTRAGE.description: The user rampages and attacks for three turns.

CLANGINGSCALES.name: Clanging Scales
CLANGINGSCALES.description: The user rubs its scales and makes a huge noise. Also lowers the user's Defense stat by three steps.

COREENFORCER.name: Core Enforcer
COREENFORCER.description: If the target has already moved this turn, the effect of its Ability is negated.

SPACIALREND.name: Spacial Rend
SPACIALREND.description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits twice as often.

DRAGONHAMMER.name: Dragon Hammer
DRAGONHAMMER.description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

DRAGONPULSE.name: Dragon Pulse
DRAGONPULSE.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

DRAGONCLAW.name: Dragon Claw
DRAGONCLAW.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

DRAGONBREATH.name: Dragon Breath
DRAGONBREATH.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It has a 30% chance to numb.

DRAGONTAIL.name: Dragon Tail
DRAGONTAIL.description: The user forces the target to switch out, to be replaced at random. In the wild, the battle ends.

DUALCHOP.name: Dual Chop
DUALCHOP.description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

TWISTER.name: Twister
TWISTER.description: A small tornado hits the opposing team. It has a 30% chance to make targets flinch.

DRAGONDANCE.name: Dragon Dance
DRAGONDANCE.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance, raising its Attack by two steps and Speed by one.

BREAKINGSWIPE.name: Breaking Swipe
BREAKINGSWIPE.description: The user swings its tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon, lowering their Attack stats by two steps.

DRAGONDARTS.name: Dragon Darts
DRAGONDARTS.description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

DYNAMAXCANNON.name: Dynamax Cannon
DYNAMAXCANNON.description: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core.

ETERNABEAM.name: Eternabeam
ETERNABEAM.description: Eternatus's most powerful attack in its original form. The user can't move on the next turn.

CLANGOROUSSOUL.name: Clangorous Soul
CLANGOROUSSOUL.description: The user raises all its stats by two steps, at the cost of 1/3rd of its max HP.

DRAGONENERGY.name: Dragon Energy
DRAGONENERGY.description: Attacks all enemy Pokémon with pure vitality. Weakens in damage as the user loses HP. Weakest at half HP.

BOLTSTRIKE.name: Bolt Strike
BOLTSTRIKE.description: The user charges at its foe, surrounding itself with lightning. It has a 30% chance to numb.

VOLTTACKLE.name: Volt Tackle
VOLTTACKLE.description: The user charges at the foe while electrified. The user also takes 33% recoil. This has a 10% chance to numb.

ZAPCANNON.name: Zap Cannon
ZAPCANNON.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause numbing.

THUNDER.name: Thunder
THUNDER.description: Can't miss in rain. It has a 30% chance to numb. Can hit targets flying high up.

FUSIONBOLT.name: Fusion Bolt
FUSIONBOLT.description: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. It does more damage if influenced by an enormous flame.

PLASMAFISTS.name: Plasma Fists
PLASMAFISTS.description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. Normal-type moves become Electric-type.

THUNDERBOLT.name: Thunderbolt
THUNDERBOLT.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It has a 10% chance to numb.

WILDCHARGE.name: Wild Charge
WILDCHARGE.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its foe. The user also takes 25% recoil.

DISCHARGE.name: Discharge
DISCHARGE.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It has a 30% chance to numb.

ZINGZAP.name: Zing Zap
ZINGZAP.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. It has a 60% chance to make the target flinch.

THUNDERPUNCH.name: Thunder Punch
THUNDERPUNCH.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It has a 10% chance to numb.

VOLTSWITCH.name: Volt Switch
VOLTSWITCH.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

PARABOLICCHARGE.name: Parabolic Charge
PARABOLICCHARGE.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage dealt.

SPARK.name: Spark
SPARK.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It has a 30% chance to numb.

THUNDERFANG.name: Thunder Fang
THUNDERFANG.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It has a 10% chance to flinch and a 10% chance to numb.

SHOCKWAVE.name: Shock Wave
SHOCKWAVE.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. Can't miss and skips protections.

ELECTROWEB.name: Electroweb
ELECTROWEB.description: The user captures and attacks foes by using an electric net, which lowers their Speed stat by two steps.

CHARGEBEAM.name: Charge Beam
CHARGEBEAM.description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity, raising the user's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

THUNDERSHOCK.name: Thunder Shock
THUNDERSHOCK.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It has a 10% chance to numb.

NUZZLE.name: Nuzzle
NUZZLE.description: The user nuzzles its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target numbed.

ELECTROBALL.name: Electro Ball
ELECTROBALL.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the foe. It does more damage the faster the user is.

CHARGE.name: Charge
CHARGE.description: The user becomes charged, doubling its next Electric-type attack. Also raises the user's defensive stats by two steps each.

EERIEIMPULSE.name: Eerie Impulse
EERIEIMPULSE.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat by four steps.

MAGNETRISE.name: Magnet Rise
MAGNETRISE.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

NUMB.name: Numb
NUMB.description: A weak electric charge is launched to numb the target.

BOLTBEAK.name: Bolt Beak
BOLTBEAK.description: Attacks with an electrified beak. Power doubles unless the target has moved this turn.

THUNDEROUSKICK.name: Thunderous Kick
THUNDEROUSKICK.description: The user kicks the target with lightning-like movement. It lowers the target's Defense by two steps.

THUNDERCAGE.name: Thunder Cage
THUNDERCAGE.description: The user throws a cage of electricity around the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

LIGHTOFRUIN.name: Light of Ruin
LIGHTOFRUIN.description: Fires a powerful beam of light drawn from the Eternal Flower. The user also takes 50% recoil.

FLEURCANNON.name: Fleur Cannon
FLEURCANNON.description: The user unleashes a strong beam. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by four steps.

MOONBLAST.name: Moonblast
MOONBLAST.description: The user attacks by borrowing the power of the moon. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

PLAYROUGH.name: Play Rough
PLAYROUGH.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. It has a 20% chance to lower Attack.

DAZZLINGGLEAM.name: Dazzling Gleam
DAZZLINGGLEAM.description: The user emits a powerful damaging flash. It has a 10% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

DRAININGKISS.name: Draining Kiss
DRAININGKISS.description: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by 75% of the damage dealt.

DISARMINGVOICE.name: Disarming Voice
DISARMINGVOICE.description: The user does emotional damage to foes. This attack never misses and skips protections.

FAIRYWIND.name: Fairy Wind
FAIRYWIND.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it. There's a 10% chance it becomes dizzy.

AROMATICMIST.name: Aromatic Mist
AROMATICMIST.description: The user raises the Def and Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by three steps using a mysterious aroma.

BABYDOLLEYES.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
BABYDOLLEYES.description: The user stares with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat by three steps. Always goes first.

CHARM.name: Charm
CHARM.description: The user gazes charmingly at the target. The target's Attack is lowered by four steps.

CRAFTYSHIELD.name: Crafty Shield
CRAFTYSHIELD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power.

FAIRYLOCK.name: Fairy Lock
FAIRYLOCK.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

FLORALHEALING.name: Floral Healing
FLORALHEALING.description: The user restores the target's HP by 50% of its max hp, or 2/3rds in moonglow.

GEOMANCY.name: Geomancy
GEOMANCY.description: The user absorbs energy and raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by four steps on the next turn.

NATURESMADNESS.name: Nature's Madness
NATURESMADNESS.description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.

SPIRITBREAK.name: Spirit Break
SPIRITBREAK.description: Attacks the target and breaks its spirit. Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by two steps.

DECORATE.name: Decorate
DECORATE.description: The user decorates the target, raising their Attack and Sp. Atk by five steps each.

STRANGESTEAM.name: Strange Steam
STRANGESTEAM.description: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. It has a 20% chance to dizzy.

FOCUSPUNCH.name: Focus Punch
FOCUSPUNCH.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

HIGHJUMPKICK.name: High Jump Kick
HIGHJUMPKICK.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

CLOSECOMBAT.name: Close Combat
CLOSECOMBAT.description: The user fights the foe up close without guarding itself. This cuts the user's Defenses by two steps.

FOCUSBLAST.name: Focus Blast
FOCUSBLAST.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power.

SUPERPOWER.name: Superpower
SUPERPOWER.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

CROSSCHOP.name: Cross Chop
CROSSCHOP.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits twice as often.

DYNAMICPUNCH.name: Dynamic Punch
DYNAMICPUNCH.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It dizzies the target if it hits.

FLYINGPRESS.name: Flying Press
FLYINGPRESS.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is also Flying-type.

HAMMERARM.name: Hammer Arm
HAMMERARM.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. Lowers the user's Speed by two steps.

SACREDSWORD.name: Sacred Sword
SACREDSWORD.description: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. Ignores the target's stat step changes.

SECRETSWORD.name: Secret Sword
SECRETSWORD.description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in it does physical damage to the foe.

AURASPHERE.name: Aura Sphere
AURASPHERE.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

SUBMISSION.name: Submission
SUBMISSION.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. The user also takes 33% recoil.

BRICKBREAK.name: Brick Break
BRICKBREAK.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It also breaks any screens protecting the target's side.

DRAINPUNCH.name: Drain Punch
DRAINPUNCH.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by one third the damage taken by the target.

WAKEUPSLAP.name: Wake-Up Slap
WAKEUPSLAP.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

LOWSWEEP.name: Low Sweep
LOWSWEEP.description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat by two steps.

FORCEPALM.name: Force Palm
FORCEPALM.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It has a 30% chance to numb.

REVENGE.name: Revenge
REVENGE.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

ROLLINGKICK.name: Rolling Kick
ROLLINGKICK.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

STORMTHROW.name: Storm Throw
STORMTHROW.description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

KARATECHOP.name: Karate Chop
KARATECHOP.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits twice as often.

MACHPUNCH.name: Mach Punch
MACHPUNCH.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

POWERUPPUNCH.name: Power-Up Punch
POWERUPPUNCH.description: Striking opponents repeatedly makes the user's fists harder, raising the user's Attack stat by two steps.

SMASH.name: Smash
SMASH.description: The user attacks with a strong punch. It has a 20% chance to lower Defense.

VACUUMWAVE.name: Vacuum Wave
VACUUMWAVE.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

DOUBLEKICK.name: Double Kick
DOUBLEKICK.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

ARMTHRUST.name: Arm Thrust
ARMTHRUST.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row. Has a 10% chance to numb.

COUNTER.name: Counter
COUNTER.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

FINALGAMBIT.name: Final Gambit
FINALGAMBIT.description: The user risks all to attack the foe. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

LOWKICK.name: Low Kick
LOWKICK.description: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

REVERSAL.name: Reversal
REVERSAL.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

BULKUP.name: Bulk Up
BULKUP.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up, raising its Attack and Defense by two steps each.

MATBLOCK.name: Mat Block
MATBLOCK.description: The user protects itself and allies from damaging moves. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

QUICKGUARD.name: Quick Guard
QUICKGUARD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. It always fails if it is used in succession.

OCTOLOCK.name: Octolock
OCTOLOCK.description: Locks the target in and prevents fleeing. Lowers target's Defense and Sp. Def by two steps every turn.

METEORASSAULT.name: Meteor Assault
METEORASSAULT.description: Attacks wildly with swords or fists. The user can't move on the next turn.

NORETREAT.name: No Retreat
NORETREAT.description: The user traps itself into the battle and raises all of their stats by two steps.

COACHING.name: Coaching
COACHING.description: The user coaches its ally Pokémon, raising their Attack and Defense by two steps each.

BODYPRESS.name: Body Press
BODYPRESS.description: The user slams into the opponent, dealing damage based on the user's Defense stat.

VCREATE.name: V-create
VCREATE.description: With a fiery forehead, the user hurls itself at the foe. Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed by two steps each.

ERUPTION.name: Eruption
ERUPTION.description: The user attacks in an explosive fury. Weakens in damage as the user loses HP. Weakest at half HP.

MINDBLOWN.name: Mind Blown
MINDBLOWN.description: The user attacks everything by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

SHELLTRAP.name: Shell Trap
SHELLTRAP.description: The user sets a shell trap. If it is hit by a physical move, the trap explodes and hurts all near foes.

BLUEFLARE.name: Blue Flare
BLUEFLARE.description: The user attacks by engulfing the foe in a beautiful, yet intense, blue flame. It has a 30% chance to burn.

BURNUP.name: Burn Up
BURNUP.description: To inflict massive damage, the user uses up its Fire-typing.

OVERHEAT.name: Overheat
OVERHEAT.description: The user attacks the target at full power. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by four steps.

FLAREBLITZ.name: Flare Blitz
FLAREBLITZ.description: The user charges at the foe while on fire. The user also takes 33% recoil. This has a 10% chance to burn.

FIREBLAST.name: Fire Blast
FIREBLAST.description: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.

FUSIONFLARE.name: Fusion Flare
FUSIONFLARE.description: The user brings down a giant flame. It does more damage if influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

INFERNO.name: Inferno
INFERNO.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

MAGMASTORM.name: Magma Storm
MAGMASTORM.description: The user spews magma around the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

SACREDFIRE.name: Sacred Fire
SACREDFIRE.description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. Burns the target.

SEARINGSHOT.name: Searing Shot
SEARINGSHOT.description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It has a 30% chance to burn.

HEATWAVE.name: Heat Wave
HEATWAVE.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It has a 10% chance to burn.

FLAMETHROWER.name: Flamethrower
FLAMETHROWER.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It has a 10% chance to burn.

BLAZEKICK.name: Blaze Kick
BLAZEKICK.description: The user launches a kick. Critical hits twice as often. It has a 10% chance to burn.

FIRELASH.name: Fire Lash
FIRELASH.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat by two steps.

FIREPLEDGE.name: Fire Pledge
FIREPLEDGE.description: A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its Grass equivalent, it makes a sea of fire.

LAVAPLUME.name: Lava Plume
LAVAPLUME.description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It has a 30% chance to burn.

FIREPUNCH.name: Fire Punch
FIREPUNCH.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It has a 10% chance to burn.

MYSTICALFIRE.name: Mystical Fire
MYSTICALFIRE.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

FIREFANG.name: Fire Fang
FIREFANG.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It has a 10% chance to flinch and a 10% chance to burn.

FLAMEWHEEL.name: Flame Wheel
FLAMEWHEEL.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It has a 20% chance to burn.

INCINERATE.name: Incinerate
INCINERATE.description: The user attacks the foe with fire. The target's held Berry or Gem becomes burnt up and unusable.

FLAMECHARGE.name: Flame Charge
FLAMECHARGE.description: The user cloaks itself in flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed.

EMBER.name: Ember
EMBER.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It has a 10% chance to burn.

FIRESPIN.name: Fire Spin
FIRESPIN.description: The user engulfs the target in fierce flames, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

HEATCRASH.name: Heat Crash
HEATCRASH.description: The user slams the foe with its flaming body. The heavier the user is, the greater the damage.

SUNSHINE.name: Sunshine
SUNSHINE.description: Summons sunshine for eight turns, boosting Fire-type attacks and hindering most others.

WILLOWISP.name: Will-O-Wisp
WILLOWISP.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

PYROBALL.name: Pyro Ball
PYROBALL.description: Attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball.

BURNINGJEALOUSY.name: Burning Jealousy
BURNINGJEALOUSY.description: Attacks with energy from jealousy. All opposing Pokémon with stat boosts get burned.

BRAVEBIRD.name: Brave Bird
BRAVEBIRD.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes 33% recoil.

DRAGONASCENT.name: Dragon Ascent
DRAGONASCENT.description: The user soars upward and drops at high speeds. This lowers the user's defensive stats.

AEROBLAST.name: Aeroblast
AEROBLAST.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits twice as often.

BEAKBLAST.name: Beak Blast
BEAKBLAST.description: The user heats up its beak before attacking. Physically attacking in this time results in a burn.

FLY.name: Fly
FLY.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn.

BOUNCE.name: Bounce
BOUNCE.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It has a 30% chance to numb.

DRILLPECK.name: Drill Peck
DRILLPECK.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

OBLIVIONWING.name: Oblivion Wing
OBLIVIONWING.description: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by 75% of the damage dealt.

AIRSLASH.name: Air Slash
AIRSLASH.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It has a 40% chance to flinch the target.

CHATTER.name: Chatter
CHATTER.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It also dizzies the target.

AERIALACE.name: Aerial Ace
AERIALACE.description: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. Can't miss and skips protections.

PLUCK.name: Pluck
PLUCK.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

WINGCRASH.name: Wing Crash
WINGCRASH.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings. The user also takes 20% recoil.

ACROBATICS.name: Acrobatics
ACROBATICS.description: The user nimbly strikes the foe. Doubles in damage if the user has no item when the move starts.

GUST.name: Gust
GUST.description: The user whips up a gust of wind to attack the target.

PECK.name: Peck
PECK.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

DEFOG.name: Defog
DEFOG.description: The user whips up a wind to blow away the target's protective screens. Also removes hazards on both sides.

FEATHERDANCE.name: Feather Dance
FEATHERDANCE.description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that lowers its Attack stat by five steps.

MIRRORMOVE.name: Mirror Move
MIRRORMOVE.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

ROOST.name: Roost
ROOST.description: Restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP. User loses Flying-type this turn.

TAILWIND.name: Tailwind
TAILWIND.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

DUALWINGBEAT.name: Dual Wingbeat
DUALWINGBEAT.description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

SHADOWFORCE.name: Shadow Force
SHADOWFORCE.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe protects itself.

MOONGEISTBEAM.name: Moongeist Beam
MOONGEISTBEAM.description: The user emits a sinister ray. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

PHANTOMFORCE.name: Phantom Force
PHANTOMFORCE.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes on the next turn. Skips and destroys protections.

SPECTRALTHIEF.name: Spectral Thief
SPECTRALTHIEF.description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

SHADOWBONE.name: Shadow Bone
SHADOWBONE.description: The user beats the target with a bone containing a spirit. This lowers their Defense by three steps.

SHADOWBALL.name: Shadow Ball
SHADOWBALL.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

SPIRITSHACKLE.name: Spirit Shackle
SPIRITSHACKLE.description: The user attacks while also stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent it fleeing.

SHADOWCLAW.name: Shadow Claw
SHADOWCLAW.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits twice as often.

HEX.name: Hex
HEX.description: The user hexes the target with evil magic. This deals double damage if the target has a status condition.

OMINOUSWIND.name: Ominous Wind
OMINOUSWIND.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It has a 20% chance to raise all stats.

SHADOWPUNCH.name: Shadow Punch
SHADOWPUNCH.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

SHADOWSNEAK.name: Shadow Sneak
SHADOWSNEAK.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

ASTONISH.name: Astonish
ASTONISH.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It has a 40% chance to flinch.

LICK.name: Lick
LICK.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It has a 30% chance to numb.

CONFUSERAY.name: Confuse Ray
CONFUSERAY.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray, causing it to become dizzy.

DESTINYBOND.name: Destiny Bond
DESTINYBOND.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

NIGHTMARE.name: Nightmare
NIGHTMARE.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

TRICKORTREAT.name: Trick-or-Treat
TRICKORTREAT.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

POLTERGEIST.name: Poltergeist
POLTERGEIST.description: Attacks the target by controlling its item. Fails if the target doesn't have an item.

ASTRALBARRAGE.name: Astral Barrage
ASTRALBARRAGE.description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

LEAFSTORM.name: Leaf Storm
LEAFSTORM.description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by four steps.

PETALDANCE.name: Petal Dance
PETALDANCE.description: The user attacks by scattering petals for three turns.

POWERWHIP.name: Power Whip
POWERWHIP.description: The user violently whirls to lash the target. Can't miss if the target has already attacked this turn.

SEEDFLARE.name: Seed Flare
SEEDFLARE.description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. This lower's the target's Sp. Def.

SOLARBEAM.name: Solar Beam
SOLARBEAM.description: The user charges, then attacks on the second turn. Charges instantly in Sunshine.

WOODHAMMER.name: Wood Hammer
WOODHAMMER.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. The user also takes 33% recoil.

LEAFBLADE.name: Leaf Blade
LEAFBLADE.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by slashing. Critical hits twice as often.

PETALBLIZZARD.name: Petal Blizzard
PETALBLIZZARD.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

GRASSPLEDGE.name: Grass Pledge
GRASSPLEDGE.description: A column of grass hits the foes. When used with its water equivalent, it creates a vast swamp.

SEEDBOMB.name: Seed Bomb
SEEDBOMB.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

GIGADRAIN.name: Giga Drain
GIGADRAIN.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

TROPKICK.name: Trop Kick
TROPKICK.description: The user lands an intense tropical kick on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat by two steps.

MAGICALLEAF.name: Magical Leaf
MAGICALLEAF.description: The user scatters leaves that chase the target. Can't miss and skips protections.

NEEDLEARM.name: Needle Arm
NEEDLEARM.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It has a 50% chance to make the target flinch.

RAZORLEAF.name: Razor Leaf
RAZORLEAF.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits twice as often.

VINEWHIP.name: Vine Whip
VINEWHIP.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines.

LEAFAGE.name: Leafage
LEAFAGE.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves. Critical hits twice as often.

MEGADRAIN.name: Mega Drain
MEGADRAIN.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

BULLETSEED.name: Bullet Seed
BULLETSEED.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

ABSORB.name: Absorb
ABSORB.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

GRASSKNOT.name: Grass Knot
GRASSKNOT.description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.

AROMATHERAPY.name: Aromatherapy
AROMATHERAPY.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

COTTONGUARD.name: Cotton Guard
COTTONGUARD.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, raising its Defense stat by five steps.

COTTONSPORE.name: Cotton Spore
COTTONSPORE.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the foe, reducing their Speed by four steps.

FORESTSCURSE.name: Forest's Curse
FORESTSCURSE.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

INGRAIN.name: Ingrain
INGRAIN.description: The user lays roots that restore 1/8th HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

LEECHSEED.name: Leech Seed
LEECHSEED.description: A seed is planted on the target, causing it to become leeched.

SPIKYSHIELD.name: Spiky Shield
SPIKYSHIELD.description: Protects the user from attacks. Physical attackers take 1/8th HP damage.

SPORE.name: Spore
SPORE.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep. Only one use per battle.

STRENGTHSAP.name: Strength Sap
STRENGTHSAP.description: Lowers the target's Attack stat, then restores its own HP by the target's Attack.

SYNTHESIS.name: Synthesis
SYNTHESIS.description: The user restores 1/2 of its HP, or 2/3rds in Sunshine.

WORRYSEED.name: Worry Seed
WORRYSEED.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.

BRANCHPOKE.name: Branch Poke
BRANCHPOKE.description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

DRUMBEATING.name: Drum Beating
DRUMBEATING.description: The user controls the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by two steps.

SOLARGLIDE.name: Solar Glide
SOLARGLIDE.description: Attacks by gliding on the ground. This move always goes first in sun.

JUNGLEHEALING.name: Jungle Healing
JUNGLEHEALING.description: Restores HP and heals status of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle by using Jungle Powers.

PRECIPICEBLADES.name: Precipice Blades
PRECIPICEBLADES.description: The user attacks its foes by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

EARTHQUAKE.name: Earthquake
EARTHQUAKE.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it and underground.

HIGHHORSEPOWER.name: High Horsepower
HIGHHORSEPOWER.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

EARTHPOWER.name: Earth Power
EARTHPOWER.description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

LANDSWRATH.name: Land's Wrath
LANDSWRATH.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on foes to damage them.

THOUSANDARROWS.name: Thousand Arrows
THOUSANDARROWS.description: This move also hits Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

THOUSANDWAVES.name: Thousand Waves
THOUSANDWAVES.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can't flee from battle.

DIG.name: Dig
DIG.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn.

DRILLRUN.name: Drill Run
DRILLRUN.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits twice as often.

STOMPINGTANTRUM.name: Stomping Tantrum
STOMPINGTANTRUM.description: The user attacks driven by frustration. Power increases if previous move failed.

BONECLUB.name: Bone Club
BONECLUB.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. It has a 50% chance to make the target flinch.

BULLDOZE.name: Bulldoze
BULLDOZE.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping on the ground. It reduces hit Pokémon's Speed.

MUDSHOT.name: Mud Shot
MUDSHOT.description: The user attacks by shooting a beam of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed by two steps.

BONEMERANG.name: Bonemerang
BONEMERANG.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

SANDTOMB.name: Sand Tomb
SANDTOMB.description: The user spins a sandstorm around the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

BONERUSH.name: Bone Rush
BONERUSH.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

SHOREUP.name: Shore Up
SHOREUP.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

SPIKES.name: Spikes
SPIKES.description: The user lays spikes at the foe's feet. Foes that switch into battle are hurt a bit for each layer.

SCORCHINGSANDS.name: Scorching Sands
SCORCHINGSANDS.description: Throws scorching sand at the target to attack. It has a 30% chance to burn.

FREEZESHOCK.name: Freeze Shock
FREEZESHOCK.description: On the second turn, the user hits the foe with electrically charged ice. It has a 30% chance to numb.

ICEBURN.name: Ice Burn
ICEBURN.description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the foe. It has a 30% chance to burn.

BLIZZARD.name: Blizzard
BLIZZARD.description: A blizzard strikes all near foes. Can't miss in hail. 30% chance to frostbite.

ICEHAMMER.name: Ice Hammer
ICEHAMMER.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. Lowers the user's Speed by two steps.

ICEBEAM.name: Ice Beam
ICEBEAM.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It has a 10% chance to frostbite.

ICICLECRASH.name: Icicle Crash
ICICLECRASH.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the foe. It has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

ICEPUNCH.name: Ice Punch
ICEPUNCH.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It has a 10% chance to frostbite.

AURORABEAM.name: Aurora Beam
AURORABEAM.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It has a 30% chance to lower Attack.

GLACIATE.name: Glaciate
GLACIATE.description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at all near foes. This attack reduces the targets' Speed by two steps.

ICEFANG.name: Ice Fang
ICEFANG.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It has a 10% chance to flinch and a 10% chance to frostbite.

AVALANCHE.name: Avalanche
AVALANCHE.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

FROSTBREATH.name: Frost Breath
FROSTBREATH.description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

ICYWIND.name: Icy Wind
ICYWIND.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the targets' Speed stat by two steps.

ICESHARD.name: Ice Shard
ICESHARD.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

POWDERSNOW.name: Powder Snow
POWDERSNOW.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It has a 10% chance to frostbite.

SNOWBALL.name: Snowball
SNOWBALL.description: The user rolls into the target. Its power doubles if it hits in succession.

ICICLESPEAR.name: Icicle Spear
ICICLESPEAR.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row.

AURORAVEIL.name: Aurora Veil
AURORAVEIL.description: This move reduces damage from attacks for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

HAIL.name: Hail
HAIL.description: Summons hail for eight turns. Damages non-Ice, non-Ghost-types every turn.

GLACIALLANCE.name: Glacial Lance
GLACIALLANCE.description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

EXPLOSION.name: Explosion
EXPLOSION.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

SELFDESTRUCT.name: Self-Destruct
SELFDESTRUCT.description: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

GIGAIMPACT.name: Giga Impact
GIGAIMPACT.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

HYPERBEAM.name: Hyper Beam
HYPERBEAM.description: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

BOOMBURST.name: Boomburst
BOOMBURST.description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

LASTRESORT.name: Last Resort
LASTRESORT.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

SKULLBASH.name: Skull Bash
SKULLBASH.description: The user tucks in to raise its Defense by four steps in the first turn, then rams the foe on the second.

DOUBLEEDGE.name: Double-Edge
DOUBLEEDGE.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. The user also takes 33% recoil.

HEADCHARGE.name: Head Charge
HEADCHARGE.description: The user charges its head into the foe. As a result, it takes 2/3 of the damage as recoil.

TECHNOBLAST.name: Techno Blast
TECHNOBLAST.description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

THRASH.name: Thrash
THRASH.description: The user rampages and attacks for three turns.

EGGBOMB.name: Egg Bomb
EGGBOMB.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

JUDGMENT.name: Judgment
JUDGMENT.description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

HYPERVOICE.name: Hyper Voice
HYPERVOICE.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

MULTIATTACK.name: Multi-Attack
MULTIATTACK.description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. This move's type depends on the held memory.

REVELATIONDANCE.name: Revelation Dance
REVELATIONDANCE.description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user's type determines the type of this move.

TAKEDOWN.name: Take Down
TAKEDOWN.description: A full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user by 25% of the damage dealt.

UPROAR.name: Uproar
UPROAR.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

BODYSLAM.name: Body Slam
BODYSLAM.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It has a 30% chance to numb.

EXTREMESPEED.name: Extreme Speed
EXTREMESPEED.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

HYPERFANG.name: Hyper Fang
HYPERFANG.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It has a 40% to make the target flinch.

MEGAPUNCH.name: Mega Punch
MEGAPUNCH.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

TRIATTACK.name: Tri Attack
TRIATTACK.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. It has a 15% chance each to numb, burn, or frostbite.

CRUSHCLAW.name: Crush Claw
CRUSHCLAW.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws, lowering their Defense by three steps.

RELICSONG.name: Relic Song
RELICSONG.description: An ancient song appeals to the hearts of those listening. Switches Meloetta's form.

CHIPAWAY.name: Chip Away
CHIPAWAY.description: Seeking an opening, the user strikes continually. Ignores the target's stat step changes.

DIZZYPUNCH.name: Dizzy Punch
DIZZYPUNCH.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that have a 20% chance to dizzy.

FACADE.name: Facade
FACADE.description: Doubles its power if the user has a status condition. Ignores burn Attack reduction.

HEADBUTT.name: Headbutt
HEADBUTT.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging into the foe. It has a 20% chance to numb.

RETALIATE.name: Retaliate
RETALIATE.description: Gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the last turn, this attack's damage increases.

SECRETPOWER.name: Secret Power
SECRETPOWER.description: The user attacks with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment.

SLASH.name: Slash
SLASH.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits twice as often.

SMELLINGSALTS.name: Smelling Salts
SMELLINGSALTS.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a numbed foe. It also cures the target's numbing, however.

HORNATTACK.name: Horn Attack
HORNATTACK.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

STOMP.name: Stomp
STOMP.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

COVET.name: Covet
COVET.description: The user approaches the target, then steals their item. Items stolen from wild Pokémon are stored.

ROUND.name: Round
ROUND.description: The user attacks with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

SWIFT.name: Swift
SWIFT.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. Can't miss and skips protections.

SNORE.name: Snore
SNORE.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. It has a 50% chance to make the target flinch.

STRUGGLE.name: Struggle
STRUGGLE.description: Used only if the user has no PP. Uses the higher of the user's Attack or Sp. Atk stat. It also hurts the user.

ECHOEDVOICE.name: Echoed Voice
ECHOEDVOICE.description: The user attacks the foe with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

FAKEOUT.name: Fake Out
FAKEOUT.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

FALSESWIPE.name: False Swipe
FALSESWIPE.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

HOLDBACK.name: Hold Back
HOLDBACK.description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

PAYDAY.name: Pay Day
PAYDAY.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

POUND.name: Pound
POUND.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

QUICKATTACK.name: Quick Attack
QUICKATTACK.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

SCRATCH.name: Scratch
SCRATCH.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage. Critical hits twice as often.

TACKLE.name: Tackle
TACKLE.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

DOUBLEHIT.name: Double Hit
DOUBLEHIT.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

FEINT.name: Feint
FEINT.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

RAPIDSPIN.name: Rapid Spin
RAPIDSPIN.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate trapping and hazard moves. Also raises the user's Speed.

SPIKECANNON.name: Spike Cannon
SPIKECANNON.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

FURYSWIPES.name: Fury Swipes
FURYSWIPES.description: The target is raked two to five times. Critical hits twice as often.

BIND.name: Bind
BIND.description: The user squeezes the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

FURYPECKS.name: Fury Pecks
FURYPECKS.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

BIDE.name: Bide
BIDE.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

CRUSHGRIP.name: Crush Grip
CRUSHGRIP.description: The target is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the target has left.

ENDEAVOR.name: Endeavor
ENDEAVOR.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

FLAIL.name: Flail
FLAIL.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

NATURALGIFT.name: Natural Gift
NATURALGIFT.description: The user draws power to attack by using a held Berry. The Berry used determines its type.

SHOUT.name: Shout
SHOUT.description: The user shouts with force at the target. This move always hits first.

SPITUP.name: Spit Up
SPITUP.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released all at once in an attack.

SUPERFANG.name: Super Fang
SUPERFANG.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

TRUMPCARD.name: Trump Card
TRUMPCARD.description: Has 40 more base power for each PP missing.

WRINGOUT.name: Wring Out
WRINGOUT.description: The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack's power.

AFTERYOU.name: After You
AFTERYOU.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

ASSIST.name: Assist
ASSIST.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

BATONPASS.name: Baton Pass
BATONPASS.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat step changes.

BELLYDRUM.name: Belly Drum
BELLYDRUM.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

BESTOW.name: Bestow
BESTOW.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

BLOCK.name: Block
BLOCK.description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

CONFIDE.name: Confide
CONFIDE.description: The user tells the target a secret, lowering its Sp. Atk by three steps. Always goes first.

CONVERSION.name: Conversion
CONVERSION.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

CONVERSION2.name: Conversion 2
CONVERSION2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

COPYCAT.name: Copycat
COPYCAT.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

DISABLE.name: Disable
DISABLE.description: For five turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

ENCORE.name: Encore
ENCORE.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

ENDURE.name: Endure
ENDURE.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. It always fails if it is used in succession.

ENTRAINMENT.name: Entrainment
ENTRAINMENT.description: The user dances to compel the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

FOCUSENERGY.name: Focus Energy
FOCUSENERGY.description: The user focuses intensely on the fight, quadrupling its critical hit chance.

FOLLOWME.name: Follow Me
FOLLOWME.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

GLARE.name: Glare
GLARE.description: The user intimidates the target by staring at it to cause numbing.

GROWL.name: Growl
GROWL.description: The user growls, scaring nearby foes. Their Attack is lowered by two steps.

GROWTH.name: Growth
GROWTH.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each, or 4 in Sunshine.

HARDEN.name: Harden
HARDEN.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat by three steps.

HEALBELL.name: Heal Bell
HEALBELL.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

HELPINGHAND.name: Helping Hand
HELPINGHAND.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its next attack by 50%.

HOWL.name: Howl
HOWL.description: The user howls loudly to raise the Attack stat of itself and its allies by two steps.

LASERFOCUS.name: Laser Focus
LASERFOCUS.description: The user focuses intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

LEER.name: Leer
LEER.description: The user leers at nearby foes with sharp eyes. Their Defense stat is reduced by two steps.

LUCKYCHANT.name: Lucky Chant
LUCKYCHANT.description: The user chants an incantation, preventing the foe from landing critical hits for 10 turns.

MEFIRST.name: Me First
MEFIRST.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe's intended move with greater power.

MEANLOOK.name: Mean Look
MEANLOOK.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

METRONOME.name: Metronome
METRONOME.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

MILKDRINK.name: Milk Drink
MILKDRINK.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

MIMIC.name: Mimic
MIMIC.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used until the user is switched out.

NATUREPOWER.name: Nature Power
NATUREPOWER.description: An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

NOBLEROAR.name: Noble Roar
NOBLEROAR.description: The user intimidates all nearby foes, lowering their Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

PAINSPLIT.name: Pain Split
PAINSPLIT.description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

PERISHSONG.name: Perish Song
PERISHSONG.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

PROTECT.name: Protect
PROTECT.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. It fails if used in succession.

PSYCHUP.name: Psych Up
PSYCHUP.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

RECOVER.name: Recover
RECOVER.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

RECYCLE.name: Recycle
RECYCLE.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

REFLECTTYPE.name: Reflect Type
REFLECTTYPE.description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

REFRESH.name: Refresh
REFRESH.description: The user rests to cure itself of any status condition.

ROAR.name: Roar
ROAR.description: The foe is forced to switch out to a random ally. Always goes last. Ends wild battles.

SAFEGUARD.name: Safeguard
SAFEGUARD.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for ten turns.

SCARYFACE.name: Scary Face
SCARYFACE.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to reduce its Speed stat by four steps.

SCREECH.name: Screech
SCREECH.description: The user's earsplitting screech reduces the target's Defense stat by four steps.

SHARPEN.name: Sharpen
SHARPEN.description: The user's edges become sharper, raising its Attack stat by three steps.

SHELLSMASH.name: Shell Smash
SHELLSMASH.description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its defensive stats by two steps but raising attacking and Speed stats by three steps each.

SIMPLEBEAM.name: Simple Beam
SIMPLEBEAM.description: The user shoots a mysterious beam that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

SKETCH.name: Sketch
SKETCH.description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the foe. Once used, Sketch disappears.

SLACKOFF.name: Slack Off
SLACKOFF.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

SLEEPTALK.name: Sleep Talk
SLEEPTALK.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

SOFTBOILED.name: Soft-Boiled
SOFTBOILED.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

SPLASH.name: Splash
SPLASH.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

SPOTLIGHT.name: Spotlight
SPOTLIGHT.description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only it will be attacked during the turn.

STOCKPILE.name: Stockpile
STOCKPILE.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

SUBSTITUTE.name: Substitute
SUBSTITUTE.description: The user spends 25% HP to create a doll to protect it from move damage, additional effects, and status moves.

SUPERSONIC.name: Supersonic
SUPERSONIC.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. The target becomes dizzy.

SWALLOW.name: Swallow
SWALLOW.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP.

SWORDSDANCE.name: Swords Dance
SWORDSDANCE.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It raises the user's Attack stat by four steps.

TEARFULLOOK.name: Tearful Look
TEARFULLOOK.description: The user gets teary eyed. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

TEETERDANCE.name: Teeter Dance
TEETERDANCE.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that dizzies the Pokémon around it.

TICKLE.name: Tickle
TICKLE.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense by two steps each.

TRANSFORM.name: Transform
TRANSFORM.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

WHIRLWIND.name: Whirlwind
WHIRLWIND.description: The foe is forced to switch out to a random ally. Always goes last. Ends wild battles.

WISH.name: Wish
WISH.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

WORKUP.name: Work Up
WORKUP.description: The user is roused, raising its Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

YAWN.name: Yawn
YAWN.description: The user yawns, making the target drowsy. They'll fall asleep at end of the next turn.

STUFFCHEEKS.name: Stuff Cheeks
STUFFCHEEKS.description: The user eats its held Berry, then raises both its defensive stats by three steps.

TEATIME.name: Teatime
TEATIME.description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

BELCH.name: Belch
BELCH.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. Deals double damage if the user has eaten a berry this battle.

GUNKSHOT.name: Gunk Shot
GUNKSHOT.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack.

SLUDGEWAVE.name: Sludge Wave
SLUDGEWAVE.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It has a 10% chance to poison.

SLUDGEBOMB.name: Sludge Bomb
SLUDGEBOMB.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It has a 30% chance to poison.

POISONJAB.name: Poison Jab
POISONJAB.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It has a 10% chance to poison.

CROSSPOISON.name: Cross Poison
CROSSPOISON.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that has a 20% chance to poison. Critical hits twice as often.

SLUDGE.name: Sludge
SLUDGE.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It has a 30% chance to poison.

VENOSHOCK.name: Venoshock
VENOSHOCK.description: The user drenches the foe in a special poisonous liquid. Its power doubles if the target is poisoned.

CLEARSMOG.name: Clear Smog
CLEARSMOG.description: The user attacks with a cloud of white smoke. All of the target's stat step changes are returned to normal.

POISONFANG.name: Poison Fang
POISONFANG.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs with a 50% chance to poison.

POISONTAIL.name: Poison Tail
POISONTAIL.description: The user hits the target with its tail. It has a 10% chance to poison. Critical hits twice as often.

ACID.name: Acid
ACID.description: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

ACIDSPRAY.name: Acid Spray
ACIDSPRAY.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This reduces the target's Sp. Def stat by four steps.

SMOG.name: Smog
SMOG.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It has a 30% chance to poison.

POISONSTING.name: Poison Sting
POISONSTING.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This has a 30% chance to poison.

COIL.name: Coil
COIL.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack, Defense, and accuracy by two steps each.

POISONGAS.name: Poison Gas
POISONGAS.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It poisons those hit.

PURIFY.name: Purify
PURIFY.description: The user heals the target's status condition. If so, it also restores the user's own HP.

TOXICTHREAD.name: Toxic Thread
TOXICTHREAD.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lowers the target's Speed stat by four steps.

VENOMDRENCH.name: Venom Drench
VENOMDRENCH.description: Nearby poisoned foes have their Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed lowered by three steps each.

SHELLSIDEARM.name: Shell Side Arm
SHELLSIDEARM.description: Inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This has a 25% chance to poison.

PRISMATICLASER.name: Prismatic Laser
PRISMATICLASER.description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

PSYCHOBOOST.name: Psycho Boost
PSYCHOBOOST.description: The user attacks the target at full power. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by four steps.

FUTURESIGHT.name: Future Sight
FUTURESIGHT.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

DREAMABSORB.name: Dream Absorb
DREAMABSORB.description: Heals the user for 50% of the damage caused. Power doubles if the foe is asleep.

PHOTONGEYSER.name: Photon Geyser
PHOTONGEYSER.description: The user attacks with a pillar of light. Uses the higher of the user's Attack or Sp. Atk stat.

PSYCHIC.name: Psychic
PSYCHIC.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

PSYCHICFANGS.name: Psychic Fang
PSYCHICFANGS.description: The user bites the target using psychic capabilities. Also breaks anys Screens protecting the target's side.

EXTRASENSORY.name: Extrasensory
EXTRASENSORY.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

HYPERSPACEHOLE.name: Hyperspace Hole
HYPERSPACEHOLE.description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. Skips and destroys protections and substitutes. Always hits.

ZENHEADBUTT.name: Zen Headbutt
ZENHEADBUTT.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the foe. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

LUSTERPURGE.name: Luster Purge
LUSTERPURGE.description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It also lowers the target's Sp. Def by two steps.

MISTBALL.name: Mist Ball
MISTBALL.description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It also lowers the target's Sp. Atk by two steps.

PSYCHOCUT.name: Psycho Cut
PSYCHOCUT.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits twice as often.

PSYBEAM.name: Psybeam
PSYBEAM.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It has a 10% chance to dizzy.

HEARTSTAMP.name: Heart Stamp
HEARTSTAMP.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after a cute act. It has a 50% chance to cause flinching.

MINDWAVES.name: Mind Waves
MINDWAVES.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It has a 10% chance to dizzy.

MIRRORCOAT.name: Mirror Coat
MIRRORCOAT.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

PSYWAVE.name: Psywave
PSYWAVE.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

AGILITY.name: Agility
AGILITY.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster, raising its Speed by four steps.

ALLYSWITCH.name: Ally Switch
ALLYSWITCH.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

AMNESIA.name: Amnesia
AMNESIA.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It raises the user's Sp. Def by four steps.

CALMMIND.name: Calm Mind
CALMMIND.description: The user quietly focuses its mind to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps each.

COSMICPOWER.name: Cosmic Power
COSMICPOWER.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def by two steps each.

GRAVITY.name: Gravity
GRAVITY.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, forcing Pokemon down from the air and doubling all move accuracy.

GUARDSPLIT.name: Guard Split
GUARDSPLIT.description: The user employs psychic power to average its base Defense and base Sp. Def stats with those of its target.

HEALBLOCK.name: Heal Block
HEALBLOCK.description: For five turns, the foe is prevented from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

HEALPULSE.name: Heal Pulse
HEALPULSE.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

HEALINGWISH.name: Healing Wish
HEALINGWISH.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

HEARTSWAP.name: Heart Swap
HEARTSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat step changes with the target.

INSTRUCT.name: Instruct
INSTRUCT.description: The user instructs the target to use the target's last move again.

LIGHTSCREEN.name: Light Screen
LIGHTSCREEN.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

LUNARDANCE.name: Lunar Dance
LUNARDANCE.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

MAGICCOAT.name: Magic Coat
MAGICCOAT.description: Until end of turn, reflects status moves that target the user or create hazards around it.

POWERSPLIT.name: Power Split
POWERSPLIT.description: The user employs psychic power to average its base Attack and base Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

POWERTRICK.name: Power Trick
POWERTRICK.description: The user employs psychic power to switch its base Attack with its base Defense stat.

PSYCHOSHIFT.name: Psycho Shift
PSYCHOSHIFT.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

REFLECT.name: Reflect
REFLECT.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

REST.name: Rest
REST.description: The user goes to sleep to fully restore their HP and heal any status conditions.

ROLEPLAY.name: Role Play
ROLEPLAY.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

SKILLSWAP.name: Skill Swap
SKILLSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

TELEPORT.name: Teleport
TELEPORT.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon, or switch out of other battles.

TRICK.name: Trick
TRICK.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

EERIESPELL.name: Eerie Spell
EERIESPELL.description: The user casts a horrible spell on the opponent. This removes 4 PP from their last used move.

FREEZINGGLARE.name: Freezing Glare
FREEZINGGLARE.description: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. It has a 20% chance to frostbite.

HEADSMASH.name: Head Smash
HEADSMASH.description: The user attacks the foe with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes 50% recoil.

ROCKWRECKER.name: Rock Wrecker
ROCKWRECKER.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

DIAMONDSTORM.name: Diamond Storm
DIAMONDSTORM.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage foes, raising its Defense.

STONEEDGE.name: Stone Edge
STONEEDGE.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below.

POWERGEM.name: Power Gem
POWERGEM.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

ROCKSLIDE.name: Rock Slide
ROCKSLIDE.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foes to inflict damage. It has a 30% chance to cause flinching.

ANCIENTPOWER.name: Ancient Power
ANCIENTPOWER.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It has a 20% chance to raise all stats.

ROCKTOMB.name: Rock Tomb
ROCKTOMB.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by two steps.

ROCKTHROW.name: Rock Throw
ROCKTHROW.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

SMACKDOWN.name: Smack Down
SMACKDOWN.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

ACCELEROCK.name: Accelerock
ACCELEROCK.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

ROCKROLL.name: Rock Roll
ROCKROLL.description: The user rolls into the target. Its power doubles if it hits in succession.

ROCKBLAST.name: Rock Blast
ROCKBLAST.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

ROCKPOLISH.name: Rock Polish
ROCKPOLISH.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag, raising its Speed by four steps.

SANDSTORM.name: Sandstorm
SANDSTORM.description: Summons sandstorm for eight turns. Damages non-Rock, non-Ground Pokemon every turn.

STEALTHROCK.name: Stealth Rock
STEALTHROCK.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

WIDEGUARD.name: Wide Guard
WIDEGUARD.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for a turn. Always fails if used in succession.

TARSHOT.name: Tar Shot
TARSHOT.description: Pours sticky tar over the target, lowering its Speed by six steps and making it weak to Fire.

METEORBEAM.name: Meteor Beam
METEORBEAM.description: Gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk by two steps on one turn, then attacks on the next turn.

DOOMDESIRE.name: Doom Desire
DOOMDESIRE.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

IRONTAIL.name: Iron Tail
IRONTAIL.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.

SUNSTEELSTRIKE.name: Sunsteel Strike
SUNSTEELSTRIKE.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. Can't be stopped by the target's Ability.

METEORMASH.name: Meteor Mash
METEORMASH.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It has a 10% chance to raise Attack.

ANCHORSHOT.name: Anchor Shot
ANCHORSHOT.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain. The target becomes unable to flee.

FLASHCANNON.name: Flash Cannon
FLASHCANNON.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

IRONHEAD.name: Iron Head
IRONHEAD.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

SMARTHORN.name: Smart Horn
SMARTHORN.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. Can't miss and skips protections.

STEELWING.name: Steel Wing
STEELWING.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. It has a 30% chance to raise the user's Defense.

DOUBLEIRONBASH.name: Double Iron Bash
DOUBLEIRONBASH.description: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes twice. Each hit has a 30% chance to cause flinching.

GEARGRIND.name: Gear Grind
GEARGRIND.description: The user attacks by grinding two of its steel gears against the target.

METALCLAW.name: Metal Claw
METALCLAW.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It has a 20% chance to raise Attack.

BULLETPUNCH.name: Bullet Punch
BULLETPUNCH.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

GYROBALL.name: Gyro Ball
GYROBALL.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

HEAVYSLAM.name: Heavy Slam
HEAVYSLAM.description: The user slams into the foe with its heavy body. The heavier the user, the greater the damage.

METALBURST.name: Metal Burst
METALBURST.description: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.

AUTOTOMIZE.name: Autotomize
AUTOTOMIZE.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and raise its Speed by four steps.

IRONDEFENSE.name: Iron Defense
IRONDEFENSE.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, raising its Defense stat by four steps.

KINGSSHIELD.name: King's Shield
KINGSSHIELD.description: Protects the user from damage this turn. It also lowers the Attack of physical attackers by two steps.

METALSOUND.name: Metal Sound
METALSOUND.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal reduces the target's Sp. Def stat by four steps.

SHIFTGEAR.name: Shift Gear
SHIFTGEAR.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and Speed by two steps each.

BEHEMOTHBASH.name: Behemoth Bash
BEHEMOTHBASH.description: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target.

BEHEMOTHBLADE.name: Behemoth Blade
BEHEMOTHBLADE.description: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target.

SNAPTRAP.name: Snap Trap
SNAPTRAP.description: The user snares the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

STEELBEAM.name: Steel Beam
STEELBEAM.description: Fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. The user loses half its current HP.

WATERSPOUT.name: Water Spout
WATERSPOUT.description: The user spouts water to damage the foe. Weakens in damage as the user loses HP. Weakest at half HP.

HYDROPUMP.name: Hydro Pump
HYDROPUMP.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

ORIGINPULSE.name: Origin Pulse
ORIGINPULSE.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

STEAMERUPTION.name: Steam Eruption
STEAMERUPTION.description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This has a 30% chance to burn.

CRABHAMMER.name: Crabhammer
CRABHAMMER.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits twice as often.

SPARKLINGARIA.name: Sparkling Aria
SPARKLINGARIA.description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any burnt Pokémon will be healed by these bubbles.

SURF.name: Surf
SURF.description: It swamps the area with a giant wave, hitting every battler nearby and underwater.

LIQUIDATION.name: Liquidation
LIQUIDATION.description: Slams into the target using an aquatic blast with a 20% chance to lower Defense.

DIVE.name: Dive
