DIVE.description: Diving on the first turn, the user rises and hits from below water on the next turn.

SCALD.name: Scald
SCALD.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This has a 30% chance to burn.

WATERPLEDGE.name: Water Pledge
WATERPLEDGE.description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, it makes a rainbow.

WATERFALL.name: Waterfall
WATERFALL.description: The user charges at the target and has a 40% chance to make it flinch.

RAZORSHELL.name: Razor Shell
RAZORSHELL.description: The user cuts the foe with sharp shells. It has a 50% chance to lower Defense.

BRINE.name: Brine
BRINE.description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

BUBBLEBEAM.name: Bubble Beam
BUBBLEBEAM.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. It also lowers the foe's Speed stat.

WATERPULSE.name: Water Pulse
WATERPULSE.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It has a 20% chance to dizzy.

AQUAJET.name: Aqua Jet
AQUAJET.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

BUBBLE.name: Bubble
BUBBLE.description: A spray of bubbles is jetted at all near foes. This has a 10% chance to lower their Speed.

WATERGUN.name: Water Gun
WATERGUN.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

CLAMP.name: Clamp
CLAMP.description: The user clamps onto the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

WHIRLPOOL.name: Whirlpool
WHIRLPOOL.description: The user swirls the target in a whirlpool, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

WATERSHURIKEN.name: Water Shuriken
WATERSHURIKEN.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars 2-5 times in a row. This move always goes first.

RAIN.name: Rain
RAIN.description: Summons rain for eight turns, boosting Water-type attacks and hindering most others.

SOAK.name: Soak
SOAK.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

SNIPESHOT.name: Snipe Shot
SNIPESHOT.description: Ignores all attempts at redirection, allowing this move to hit the chosen target. Critical hits twice as often.

FISHIOUSREND.name: Fishious Rend
FISHIOUSREND.description: Rends the target with its hard gills. Power doubles unless the target has moved this turn.

LIFEDEW.name: Life Dew
LIFEDEW.description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and allies by 25%.

SURGINGSTRIKES.name: Surging Strikes
SURGINGSTRIKES.description: Strikes the target thrice, with mastery of the Water style. Always results in a critical hit.

FLIPTURN.name: Flip Turn
FLIPTURN.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

MEMENTO.name: Memento
MEMENTO.description: The user faints in order to lower the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by five steps each.

SANDSEARSTORM.name: Sandsear Storm
SANDSEARSTORM.description: The user wraps foes in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. It has a 30% chance to burn.

WILDBOLTSTORM.name: Wildbolt Storm
WILDBOLTSTORM.description: The user savagely attacks foes with lightning and wind. It has a 30% chance to numb.

BLEAKWINDSTORM.name: Bleakwind Storm
BLEAKWINDSTORM.description: The user attacks foes with savagely cold winds. It has a 30% chance to frostbite.

SPRINGTIDESTORM.name: Springtide Storm
SPRINGTIDESTORM.description: The user attacks foes with love and hate. It has a 30% chance to lower both attacking stats.

HYDROCANNON.name: Hydro Cannon
HYDROCANNON.description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

FRENZYPLANT.name: Frenzy Plant
FRENZYPLANT.description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

BLASTBURN.name: Blast Burn
BLASTBURN.description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

TWINBEAM.name: Twin Beam
TWINBEAM.description: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

PSYSHIELDBASH.name: Psyshield Bash
PSYSHIELDBASH.description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target, raising the user's Defense by two steps.

CEASELESSEDGE.name: Ceaseless Edge
CEASELESSEDGE.description: The user slashes its shell blade, leaving spikes under the target if none have already been placed.

STONEAXE.name: Stone Axe
STONEAXE.description: The user swings its stone axes. This leaves stone splinters floating around the target.

ESPERDIVE.name: Esper Dive
ESPERDIVE.description: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This boosts the user's Speed by two steps.

RAGINGFURY.name: Raging Fury
RAGINGFURY.description: The user rampages and attacks while spewing flames for three turns.

CHLOROBLAST.name: Chloroblast
CHLOROBLAST.description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. The user loses half its current HP.

DIRECLAW.name: Dire Claw
DIRECLAW.description: The user lashes out with its claws. 50% chance to poison. Critical hits twice as often.

KINDLE.name: Kindle
KINDLE.description: The user warms up its body and attacks the target. It has a 10% chance to burn.

SHATTERSHOT.name: Shatter Shot
SHATTERSHOT.description: The user grinds stone into shrapnel and sprays it at the target.

FUGUFRENZY.name: Fugu Frenzy
FUGUFRENZY.description: The user crashes into the target with its quills. It leaves the target poisoned.

DIRGE.name: Dirge
DIRGE.description: The user sings with deathly sounds to harm the target. It has a 20% chance to reduce Sp. Def.

CLACKACLACK.name: Clackaclack
CLACKACLACK.description: The user attacks with a horrible clattering noise. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

LIGHTNINGDANCE.name: Lightning Dance
LIGHTNINGDANCE.description: The user dances with the speed of lightning, raising its Sp. Atk by two steps and Speed by 1.

HARBORBREAKER.name: Harbor Breaker
HARBORBREAKER.description: The user crashes into the target like a tsunami. The user also takes 33% recoil.

SHOTPUT.name: Shotput
SHOTPUT.description: The user hurls a metal ball at the target.

WIPEOUT.name: Wipeout
WIPEOUT.description: The user rides a wave, then crashes into the target. Has a 30% chance to cause a flinch.

DIAMONDFORCE.name: Diamond Force
DIAMONDFORCE.description: The user calls up spikes of diamond. Critical hits twice as often.

CLASH.name: Clash
CLASH.description: The user harnesses inner battle instincts to strike at the target.

JOLT.name: Jolt
JOLT.description: The user strikes the enemy while coated with electricity. It has a 10% chance to numb.

ELECTROSLASH.name: Electroslash
ELECTROSLASH.description: The user harnesses a blade of lightning and slices at the target. Critical hits twice as often.

CURRENTCRASH.name: Current Crash
CURRENTCRASH.description: The user wraps their body in electricity and crashes into the target. The user also takes 20% recoil.

ESSENCEARROW.name: Essence Arrow
ESSENCEARROW.description: The user fires a small bolt of energy at the target. It has a 10% chance to raise user's Sp. Atk.

ROOTWRACK.name: Rootwrack
ROOTWRACK.description: The user sends its roots to attack. Deals 25% more damage if the target attacked first.

EAGERTICKLING.name: Eager Tickling
EAGERTICKLING.description: The user tickles the target excessively, damaging it. This has a 20% chance to lower Attack.

TREADON.name: Tread On
TREADON.description: The user attacks the opposing Pokémon by trampling it. It has a 20% chance to lower Speed.

RUMBLE.name: Rumble
RUMBLE.description: The user causes the earth to rumble, striking every Pokémon around it and underground.

TREMOR.name: Tremor
TREMOR.description: The user slams the earth, damaging all Pokémon around it and underground.

COLDEMBRACE.name: Cold Embrace
COLDEMBRACE.description: The user grabs the target in a chilly embrace. It has a 10% chance to frostbite.

STINKCLOUD.name: Stink Cloud
STINKCLOUD.description: The user gives off a terrible stench towards the target. It has a 20% chance to dizzy.

BLINDSIDE.name: Blind Side
BLINDSIDE.description: The user skillfully attacks around the enemy's guard. Can't miss and skips protections.

FEEDON.name: Feed On
FEEDON.description: The user consumes a bit of the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage dealt.

KICKSTART.name: Kickstart
KICKSTART.description: The user encourages the target to attack right after the user. Always goes first.

BOREALWIND.name: Boreal Wind
BOREALWIND.description: The user whips up a cold north wind to attack the target. It has a 20% chance to frostbite.

COLDFRONT.name: Cold Front
COLDFRONT.description: The user propels a gale-force wind at the target. It has a 10% chance to frostbite.

UNDERMINE.name: Undermine
UNDERMINE.description: The user burrows deep, then attacks with devastating power on the second turn.

VIMRIPPER.name: Vim Ripper
VIMRIPPER.description: The user rips into the target's soul, dealing damage through their Sp. Def rather than their Defense.

NASTYNIP.name: Nasty Nip
NASTYNIP.description: The user stabs the opponent with a toxin-infused limb. It has a 10% chance to poison.

LOOMINGWINTER.name: Looming Winter
LOOMINGWINTER.description: Two turns after this move is used, extreme winter cold attacks the target.

GLACIALRAM.name: Glacial Ram
GLACIALRAM.description: Rams the target with frigid force. This has a 10% chance to frostbite.

AURAFLUX.name: Aura Flux
AURAFLUX.description: The user contorts the target's chi with a special technique, lowering its Sp. Def.

REND.name: Rend
REND.description: The user shreds through the opponent's defenses, ignoring positive stat changes and abilities.

DIAMETRICBREATH.name: Diametric Breath
DIAMETRICBREATH.description: Exhales magical fumes with a 30% chance to burn or frostbite the target depending on their stats.

SCOUR.name: Scour
SCOUR.description: The user whips up a tornado to tear at the enemy team. It has a 30% chance to make them flinch.

HARSHVOICE.name: Harsh Voice
HARSHVOICE.description: The target is confronted with painful words. It has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

FINALIZE.name: Finalize
FINALIZE.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Sp. Atk stat rises by five steps.

MASSDESTRUCTION.name: Mass Destruction
MASSDESTRUCTION.description: The user emits a wave of anxious feelings which overwhelms all nearby Pokémon, taking 50% recoil.

ICEPICK.name: Ice Pick
ICEPICK.description: The user targets the target's coldest spots. Its power doubles if the target is frostbitten.

HALTINGCOLD.name: Halting Cold
HALTINGCOLD.description: The user attacks the target with a frontal cold wind. It reduces the target's Speed by three steps.

SECRETTECHNIQUE.name: Secret Technique
SECRETTECHNIQUE.description: The user attacks with a burst of inner energy. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by two steps.

BEARHUG.name: Bear Hug
BEARHUG.description: The user hugs the target intensely, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

INFERNOIMPACT.name: Inferno Impact
INFERNOIMPACT.description: The user cloaks itself in a fierce blaze and attacks. It has a 10% chance to raise Speed.

FLAREUP.name: Flare Up
FLAREUP.description: The user targets the opponents soft spots with a fiery strike. Its power doubles if the target is burned.

PIXIEPUNCH.name: Pixie Punch
PIXIEPUNCH.description: The user throws a tricky punch. Can't miss and skips protections.

INFINITEFORCE.name: Infinite Force
INFINITEFORCE.description: The user wields an exaggerated power to strike the target. Lowers the user's Attack by four steps.

TANTRUM.name: Tantrum
TANTRUM.description: The user goes on a wild tantrum for three turns.

SLAG.name: Slag
SLAG.description: The user sprays mining waste at the target. It has a 30% chance to poison.

MAGNETWAVE.name: Magnet Wave
MAGNETWAVE.description: The target is hit by a wave of magnetic energy. It has a 20% chance to lower their Speed.

HEADBANG.name: Headbang
HEADBANG.description: The user slams the target with blunt force, taking 20% recoil.

GRANITEHEAD.name: Granite Head
GRANITEHEAD.description: The user charges into the target with its stony body. The user also takes 33% recoil.

BEDROCKBREAKER.name: Bedrock Breaker
BEDROCKBREAKER.description: The user smashes its rock-hard head into the target. The user also takes 33% recoil.

TEMPEST.name: Tempest
TEMPEST.description: Chaotic winds push the target around, dizzying it.

BLUSTER.name: Bluster
BLUSTER.description: The user fires a stormy gust at the target. This also raises the user's Sp. Atk by two steps.

SHREDSHOT.name: Shred Shot
SHREDSHOT.description: The user shreads off bits of its own body to launch at the target. The user loses 30% of their current health.

SHRAPNEL.name: Shrapnel
SHRAPNEL.description: The user shoots shards of its own body at the target. The user loses 30% of their current health.

SPITEFULCHANT.name: Spiteful Chant
SPITEFULCHANT.description: The user unleashes its grudge, damaging the target and cutting 4 PP from the move last used by it.

GRIMEGRAPPLE.name: Grime Grapple
GRIMEGRAPPLE.description: The user attacks while slathered in grime. This poisons the user.

VANGUARD.name: Vanguard
VANGUARD.description: The user enters a protective stance, raising its Sp. Atk and Defense by two steps each.

FLOWSTATE.name: Flow State
FLOWSTATE.description: The user gains an instinctual knowledge of battle, raising its Attack and Sp. Def by two steps each.

SUBLIMATE.name: Sublimate
SUBLIMATE.description: To inflict massive damage, the user uses up its Ice-type.

TOXICTASTE.name: Toxic Taste
TOXICTASTE.description: The user chomps with venomous teeth. The user's HP is restored by a third of the damage dealt.

OMNISCIENTBLOW.name: Omniscient Blow
OMNISCIENTBLOW.description: Lands without fail and lowers the user's Defense and Speed.

EBBFLOW.name: Ebb & Flow
EBBFLOW.description: The user douses the target, healing itself by a third of its maximum HP in the process.

CREEPOUT.name: Creep Out
CREEPOUT.description: The user preys on the target's fear of insects, giving it a weakness to the Bug type.

ROCKAPULT.name: Rockapult
ROCKAPULT.description: The user throws a large rock at the target. If it misses, the user's accuracy is raised.

STARFALL.name: Star Fall
STARFALL.description: A star falls on the target. Witnessing this lucky star also increases the user's critical hit chance.

BUBBLEBLASTER.name: Bubble Blaster
BUBBLEBLASTER.description: A blast of bubbles is shot at the target. It has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed stat.

CONCUSS.name: Concuss
CONCUSS.description: The user fires a small shockwave. This has a 30% chance to numb the target.

VALORBOLT.name: Valor Bolt
VALORBOLT.description: The user manifests a bolt of pure courage. This has a 10% chance of raising the user's Sp. Atk.

PSYCHICOVERLOAD.name: Psychic Overload
PSYCHICOVERLOAD.description: The user overloads its mind to attack for three turns.

PSYPIERCE.name: Psypierce
PSYPIERCE.description: The user manifests a piercing bolt of psychic energy. It has a 50% chance to lower Sp. Def.

LIGHTSHOW.name: Light Show
LIGHTSHOW.description: The user attacks with small beams of light. It has a 10% chance to dizzy.

SIGNALOVERLOAD.name: Signal Overload
SIGNALOVERLOAD.description: The target is overwhelmed by light and sound. This has a 30% chance to dizzy it.

PETRIFY.name: Petrify
PETRIFY.description: The user turns the target into stone. This has a 50% chance to numb it.

CRYSTALGLEAM.name: Crystal Gleam
CRYSTALGLEAM.description: The user attacks with the bright glint of crystals. Critical hits twice as often.

WAILINGBLOW.name: Wailing Blow
WAILINGBLOW.description: The user attacks while wailing. This has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

FRIGIDFLURRY.name: Frigid Flurry
FRIGIDFLURRY.description: The user summons a wind that drains the target's vitality. This has a 30% chance to frostbite it.

DREAMDANCE.name: Dream Dance
DREAMDANCE.description: The user dances in tune with a dreamlike energy, raising their Sp. Atk by four steps.

TONGUETWISTER.name: Tongue Twister
TONGUETWISTER.description: The target is pestered by a giant tongue. This has a 50% chance to numb it.

SMOGSTORM.name: Smog Storm
SMOGSTORM.description: Summons a storm of poisonous gas to hit all nearby pokemon with a 30% chance to poison.

ENCHANTINGSONG.name: Enchanting Song
ENCHANTINGSONG.description: An enchanting outcry. It has a 30% chance to dizzy those hit.

TRAMPLE.name: Trample
TRAMPLE.description: The user tramples the target. It has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed stat.

DEMONSKISS.name: Demon's Kiss
DEMONSKISS.description: By sacrificing half its HP, the user jinxes the target with a kiss, making it fall asleep.

RUIN.name: Ruin
RUIN.description: The user brings down a ruinous power on the target. This has a 20% chance of lowering all the target's stats.

HARDFEELINGS.name: Hard Feelings
HARDFEELINGS.description: Doubles its power if the user has a status condition. Ignores frostbite Sp. Atk reduction.

SOULEATER.name: Soul Eater
SOULEATER.description: The user absorbs the target's soul, lowering its Sp. Def and draining its life in the process.

ABYSSALMIST.name: Abyssal Mist
ABYSSALMIST.description: Darkness rolls over the field, damaging all other Pokémon and setting Grey Mist for 5 turns.

ECHOLOCATE.name: Echolocate
ECHOLOCATE.description: Lowers the target's Defense and evasion by two steps each. Can't miss and skips protections.

WINGSPANECLIPSE.name: Wingspan Eclipse
WINGSPANECLIPSE.description: The Pokémon blots out the sky, summoning eclipse for eight turns and lowering each opponent's Attack by two steps.

ALLERGY.name: Allergy
ALLERGY.description: The user makes the target have an allergic reaction. This reduces their Speed by three steps.

FROMTHEBLUE.name: From the Blue
FROMTHEBLUE.description: The user lets out an electric roar, raising the user's Speed by four steps.

IGNITE.name: Ignite
IGNITE.description: The user sets the target on fire, inflicting a burn.

TORRENTSCYTHE.name: Torrent Scythe
TORRENTSCYTHE.description: The user uses a jet of water like a sword and attacks by slashing. Critical hits twice as often.

STAREDOWN.name: Stare Down
STAREDOWN.description: Stares harshly, dealing double damage if they hurt the user this turn. Only usable on the first turn.

INURE.name: Inure
INURE.description: The user inures themselves to a harsh environment, shedding their type weaknesses.

BREAKDANCE.name: Breakdance
BREAKDANCE.description: The user improvises a dance, raising its two weakest stats by three steps each.

SHIVERDANCE.name: Shiver Dance
SHIVERDANCE.description: The user raises their Attack and Defense by two steps, and Speed by one step.

NIGHTFELLING.name: Nightfelling
NIGHTFELLING.description: The user tries to surprise-attack the target. Cannot miss in moonglow. Critical hits twice as often.

STITCHUP.name: Stitch Up
STITCHUP.description: The user restores two thirds of its own HP. Then, this move is disabled.

SIXFEETUNDER.name: Six Feet Under
SIXFEETUNDER.description: The user buries the target with somber force. Then, this move is disabled.

LOOMOVER.name: Loom Over
LOOMOVER.description: The user looms over the target with awful menace, lowering their highest stat by four steps.

SUMMERDAZE.name: Summer Daze
SUMMERDAZE.description: The user plays a melody, making the target drowsy. In Sunlight, lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps.

PACIFY.name: Pacify
PACIFY.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make a dizzy target fall into a deep sleep.

LULLABY.name: Lullaby
LULLABY.description: A lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target with half its HP or less left into a deep sleep.

PUFFBALL.name: Puffball
PUFFBALL.description: The user bursts a ball of sleep-inducing powder. It fails unless the target hit the user this turn.

MUDSLING.name: Mud Sling
MUDSLING.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud. It has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Speed.

ASCRYSTAL.name: As Crystal
ASCRYSTAL.description: The user shoots purified water, also healing the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

CRITICALERROR.name: Critical Error
CRITICALERROR.description: The user causes a glitch in reality. This attack always results in a critical hit.

ACEDIANIMPACT.name: Acedian Impact
ACEDIANIMPACT.description: An attack empowered by the might of a lazy king. It skips and destroys protections.

ADAMANTINEPRESS.name: Adamantine Press
ADAMANTINEPRESS.description: The user slams the target with their rock-hard body.

CLAMOR.name: Clamor
CLAMOR.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

DOUBLEDOWN.name: Double Down
DOUBLEDOWN.description: The user punches the target twice in quick succession.

PULVERIZE.name: Pulverize
PULVERIZE.description: The user pulverizes the target with both its fists. This raises the user's Attack.

PUMMEL.name: Pummel
PUMMEL.description: The user warms up by treating the target as a punching bag, damaging them and raising Attack by two steps.

PALEBLADE.name: Pale Blade
PALEBLADE.description: The target is cut by a clean slice. Critical hits four times as often.

SPELLBIND.name: Spellbind
SPELLBIND.description: Dizzies the target by putting them under a magical spell.

AIRSTRIKE.name: Air Strike
AIRSTRIKE.description: A reckless charge attack from the air. It also damages the user by 25% of the damage dealt.

TERRAFORM.name: Terraform
TERRAFORM.description: Churns nearby rocks, dealing damage to nearby Pokémon and removing hazards from both sides.

SEERSTRIKE.name: Seer Strike
SEERSTRIKE.description: The user perfectly predicts the target's future location, then strikes. It lands without fail.

RAKE.name: Rake
RAKE.description: The user rakes the target with sharp claws.

RUPTURESPRING.name: Rupture Spring
RUPTURESPRING.description: Creates a violent spring beneath enemies, or a healing one beneath allies.

SPATTERINGRAM.name: Spattering Ram
SPATTERINGRAM.description: The user rams the target like a ship. It has a 30% chance to lower Defense.

BLOSSOM.name: Blossom
BLOSSOM.description: Flowers blooms with intensity, damaging the target and raising the user's Sp. Atk by two steps.

ENERGYBALL.name: Energy Ball
ENERGYBALL.description: The user attacks with the bursting power of nature. It has a 10% chance to raise user's Sp. Atk.

TERADRAIN.name: Tera Drain
TERADRAIN.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by 75% of the damage taken by the target.

MENDINGSPRING.name: Mending Spring
MENDINGSPRING.description: The user opens a spring to blast the target, also forming an Aqua Ring around themselves.

INERTIASHOCK.name: Inertia Shock
INERTIASHOCK.description: Deals 50% more damage if faster than the target. Lowers the user's Speed.

GEYSER.name: Geyser
GEYSER.description: The user propels a geyser of water at the target. Lowers the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps each.

HYPOTHERMIATE.name: Hypothermiate
HYPOTHERMIATE.description: For the rest of the round, the target's healing is reversed.

FROSTBARB.name: Frost Barb
FROSTBARB.description: The user jabs the target with a sharp icicle. It has a 20% chance to lower Defense.

ICECALIBUR.name: Icecalibur
ICECALIBUR.description: The user slashes the target with ice like a sword. It has a 30% chance to lower Defense.

SUPERCOOL.name: Supercool
SUPERCOOL.description: The user overwhelmes the target with a frigid ray, frostbiting it.

HUNTDOWN.name: Hunt Down
HUNTDOWN.description: The user chases the target and strikes it from above. It does more damage the faster the user is.

DIVEBOMB.name: Dive Bomb
DIVEBOMB.description: The user soars up high, then strikes on the second turn by dive bombing the target.

STRAFE.name: Strafe
STRAFE.description: The user attacks the target while dashing skillfully past it.

SWARMBURST.name: Swarm Burst
SWARMBURST.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

DIFFUSEPULSE.name: Diffuse Pulse
DIFFUSEPULSE.description: The user shoots a pulse of diffuse energy at the target.

PARTICLEPULSE.name: Particle Pulse
PARTICLEPULSE.description: The user shoots a pulse of uncharged particles at the target.

STELLARATE.name: Stellarate
STELLARATE.description: A barrage of star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team, never missing.

PILFER.name: Pilfer
PILFER.description: The user attacks and steals the foe's held Berry or Gem. It can't steal if the user holds an item.

TEASE.name: Tease
TEASE.description: The user bullies the target, causing mental damage. This has a 20% chance to leech.

SCAM.name: Scam
SCAM.description: The user steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks. Goes last.

DARKALLURE.name: Dark Allure
DARKALLURE.description: The user strikes the target with dark energy. It has a 10% chance to leech.

PLANTDOUBT.name: Plant Doubt
PLANTDOUBT.description: The user entangles the target's mind with dark thoughts, leeching it.

PROFANE.name: Profane
PROFANE.description: The user invades deep into the target's mind, leeching it.

SHRED.name: Shred
SHRED.description: The user attacks with overwhelming power, ignoring positive stat changes and abilities.

ROLLINGBOULDER.name: Rolling Boulder
ROLLINGBOULDER.description: If this move misses, the target is forced to switch out. Always goes last.

MINDWARP.name: Mind Warp
MINDWARP.description: The target's psyche is attacked directly. It has a 20% chance to dizzy.

SQUALLDART.name: Squall Dart
SQUALLDART.description: The user strikes the target with a sudden wind. It has a 40% chance to flinch the target.

MIASMA.name: Miasma
MIASMA.description: The user envelops the target in a foul wind. It has a 20% chance to lower Sp. Def.

VENOMORTAR.name: Venomortar
VENOMORTAR.description: The user blasts a bundle of venom at the target, poisoning it.

WARDPRESS.name: Ward Press
WARDPRESS.description: The user attacks with its wards, dealing damage based on the user's Sp. Def stat.

ADRENALASH.name: Adrenalash
ADRENALASH.description: The user forms their excitement into a lash with a 10% chance of raising the user's Sp. Atk.

EARTHSPLITTER.name: Earthsplitter
EARTHSPLITTER.description: The user cracks the earth under the target with a massive strike. Lowers the user's Attack by four steps.

UPINFLAMES.name: Up In Flames
UPINFLAMES.description: The user surrounds the target with fire which also destroys any 'clothing' items it's holding.

PROPELLANT.name: Propellant
PROPELLANT.description: The user explodes itself into the target. The target is harmed, but also their Speed is raised.

PSYCHOSCISSION.name: Psychoscission
PSYCHOSCISSION.description: The user cuts using scissor-like blades of psychic energy. Critical hits twice as often.

CHILL.name: Chill
CHILL.description: The user lowers the target's body temperature, afflicting it with frostbite.

GLITTERBOMB.name: Glitter Bomb
GLITTERBOMB.description: The user chucks a party favor which explodes in the target's face.

FAIRPLAY.name: Fair Play
FAIRPLAY.description: The user attacks the target with just force. Guaranteed critical hit on foes with boosted stats.

HUMBLE.name: Humble
HUMBLE.description: The user attempts to humble the target, guaranteeing a critical hit on foes with boosted stats.

POISONSPIKES.name: Poison Spikes
POISONSPIKES.description: The user lays poison spikes on the foe's side. One layer hurts switched in foes, two layers poisons.

ENVENOM.name: Envenom
ENVENOM.description: Venom is strategically introduced into the target, poisoning it.

CHAOSWHEEL.name: Chaos Wheel
CHAOSWHEEL.description: The user thrashes while infused with elements. It has a 15% chance each to poison, dizzy, or leech.

MINDLINK.name: Mind Link
MINDLINK.description: The user syncs its mind with its teammates, raising the Sp. Atk of itself and its allies by two steps.

BULLETCHARGE.name: Bullet Charge
BULLETCHARGE.description: The user uses gunpowder to rocket at its foe. It has a 30% chance to raise its Speed.

EVERNALIZE.name: Evernalize
EVERNALIZE.description: The user draws power to attack by using a held Berry. The Berry used determines its type.

SPOOKYSNUGGLING.name: Spooky Snuggling
SPOOKYSNUGGLING.description: The user harnesses its jealousy to attack the opponent with ghostly hugs, cursing them.

BULLETTRAIN.name: Bullet Train
BULLETTRAIN.description: The user becomes a pain train. It has a 10% chance to raise the user's Speed.

POISONIVY.name: Poison Ivy
POISONIVY.description: The target is irritated by allergenic plants, poisoning it.

ANESTHETIZE.name: Anesthetize
ANESTHETIZE.description: The user applies anesthetic substances, numbing the target.

DRAGBENEATH.name: Drag Beneath
DRAGBENEATH.description: The user pulls the target under the waves, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

DAZZLE.name: Dazzle
DAZZLE.description: The user dazzles nearby foes with light or sound. Their Sp. Atk is lowered by two steps.

SMIRK.name: Smirk
SMIRK.description: The user smirks with confidence. The Sp. Def of nearby enemies is reduced.

STOREFUEL.name: Store Fuel
STOREFUEL.description: The user conserves for future attacks. This raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and accuracy by two steps each.

NULLPULSE.name: Null Pulse
NULLPULSE.description: The target is struck by a pulse of negative energy. It has a 30% chance to numb.

SLAY.name: Slay
SLAY.description: The user slashes at the target with a steel blade. Super effective versus Dragon-types.

NERVEBLOCK.name: Nerve Block
NERVEBLOCK.description: The user strikes the target's pressure points, numbing it.

STUNNINGCURL.name: Stunning Curl
STUNNINGCURL.description: Halves attack damage taken this turn. Numbs any attackers. Fails if used successively.

FLAMESPIKES.name: Flame Spikes
FLAMESPIKES.description: The user lays burning spikes on the foe's side. One layer hurts switched in foes, two layers burns.

DROPKICK.name: Drop Kick
DROPKICK.description: The user drops onto the target with a kick, dealing 25% recoil to self.

MULTISTRIKE.name: Multi-strike
MULTISTRIKE.description: The target is hit two to five times in a row. Inflicts physical or special damage based on the user's stats.

PLANETCRACKER.name: Planetcracker
PLANETCRACKER.description: The user slams itself into the target with absurd force, taking 50% recoil.

SMUSH.name: Smush
SMUSH.description: Avenging bugs everywhere, the user crushes the target. It has a 20% chance to lower their Defense stat.

ACIDBATH.name: Acid Bath
ACIDBATH.description: The user and target bathe in acid. Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by two steps each.

STINGINGJEALOUSY.name: Stinging Jealousy
STINGINGJEALOUSY.description: Attacks with energy from jealousy. All opposing Pokémon with stat boosts get poisoned.

STANDTOGETHER.name: Stand Together
STANDTOGETHER.description: The user holds fast with its teammates, raising the Defense of itself and its allies by three steps.

SYMBIOSIS.name: Symbiosis
SYMBIOSIS.description: The user calms itself and its teammates, raising the Sp. Def of itself and its allies by three steps.

TRICKYTOXINS.name: Tricky Toxins
TRICKYTOXINS.description: Turns the foe's power against it, dealing damage using the target's Sp. Attack stat.

RANSACK.name: Ransack
RANSACK.description: The user skillfully blasts the target, then steals their item. Items stolen from wild Pokémon are stored.

TRAPJAW.name: Trap Jaw
TRAPJAW.description: Lures an enemy into its jaws, draining 2/3 of damage dealt if they hit the user this turn.

CAUSTICPUNCH.name: Caustic Punch
CAUSTICPUNCH.description: The user strikes with an acidic punch that destroys Gems and Berries.

DOLLSTITCH.name: Doll Stitch
DOLLSTITCH.description: The user forces itself or the target to make a substitute by turning it into a doll.

SEVER.name: Sever
SEVER.description: The user hacks at the target with great violence. Critical hits twice as often.

DEADEND.name: Dead End
DEADEND.description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

PHANTOMGATE.name: Phantom Gate
PHANTOMGATE.description: The user opens its soul to unleash massive energy. This lowers the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def.

FRESHSTART.name: Fresh Start
FRESHSTART.description: The user reinvigorates itself, healing to full. Only works the first turn the user is in battle.

LATCHON.name: Latch On
LATCHON.description: Small bugs swarm the target, causing it to become leeched.

GALLINGSPIT.name: Galling Spit
GALLINGSPIT.description: The user spits venom at the target. It has a 30% chance to poison.

CRUELTY.name: Cruelty
CRUELTY.description: The user crushes the target with evil intent. This deals double damage if the target has a status condition.

SLAMSHUT.name: Slam Shut
SLAMSHUT.description: The target is crushed in the user's shell or claws, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

MAELSTROM.name: Maelstrom
MAELSTROM.description: The foe is pulled into a huge whirlpool, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

CRIMSONSTORM.name: Crimson Storm
CRIMSONSTORM.description: The foe is engulfed in a firestorm, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

VINEBIND.name: Vinebind
VINEBIND.description: Binds the foe with vines, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

BLACKOUT.name: Blackout
BLACKOUT.description: The user removes the energy and light around the target. Super effective vs Electric-types.

HOLLYCHARM.name: Holly Charm
HOLLYCHARM.description: The user attacks the target with the power of a warding charm. Super effective vs Ghost-types.

SCUFFLE.name: Scuffle
SCUFFLE.description: The user grabs the target, slamming both of them into the ground. The user takes 20% recoil.

BEDFELLOWS.name: Bedfellows
BEDFELLOWS.description: The user and the target both fall asleep, fully restoring their HP and healing any status conditions.

LOUNGE.name: Lounge
LOUNGE.description: The user lounges around with decadent laziness, restoring its HP by 66%. This move always goes last.

THUNDERCLAP.name: Thunderclap
THUNDERCLAP.description: The user jabs the target with electric charges. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.

SINISTERSPINES.name: Sinister Spines
SINISTERSPINES.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

MIRAGEFLARE.name: Mirage Flare
MIRAGEFLARE.description: The user creates a storm using its flaming body, damaging everything around it.

HAREHEROICS.name: Hare Heroics
HAREHEROICS.description: Deals more damage the less HP the user has. After attacking, the user switches out.

RIPTURN.name: Rip Turn
RIPTURN.description: The user rips the target, lowering their Defense by two steps. After attacking, the user switches out.

REDHOTRETREAT.name: Red-Hot Retreat
REDHOTRETREAT.description: Protects the user from attacks. Also burns any attacker who specially attacks the user.

FROSTSPIKES.name: Frost Spikes
FROSTSPIKES.description: The user lays frozen spikes on the foe's side. One layer hurts switched in foes, two layers frostbites.

SANDTOSS.name: Sand Toss
SANDTOSS.description: The user tosses hot desert sand on the target. It has a 10% chance to burn.

DUSTDEVIL.name: Dust Devil
DUSTDEVIL.description: The user whips up a hot desert twister to attack the target. It has a 20% chance to burn.

DEVOURINGDUST.name: Devouring Dust
DEVOURINGDUST.description: The target is consumed by a desert storm, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

PUZZLEROOM.name: Puzzle Room
PUZZLEROOM.description: The user creates a puzzling area in which Pokémon's base Attack and Sp. Atk are swapped.

SHIVER.name: Shiver
SHIVER.description: The user drains heat from the air around the target, afflicting it with frostbite.

FRIGIDJEALOUSY.name: Frigid Jealousy
FRIGIDJEALOUSY.description: Attacks with emotion from jealousy. All opposing Pokémon with stat boosts get frostbitten.

CORECOLLAPSE.name: Core Collapse
CORECOLLAPSE.description: Astral energy explodes around the target. This move always goes first. The user also takes 50% recoil.

PATTERNRELEASE.name: Pattern Release
PATTERNRELEASE.description: Unveiling its ears, the released psychic power causes the user to attack 2-5 times for three turns.

THUNDERBELLY.name: Thunder Belly
THUNDERBELLY.description: The user takes an entire grid of power into its belly to slam the target. The user takes 100% recoil.

VOLLEYSTANCE.name: Volley Stance
VOLLEYSTANCE.description: The user prepares its dual cannons. Until switch out, each special attack hits twice.

ONEIROMANCY.name: Oneiromancy
ONEIROMANCY.description: This move raises all the user's stats by two steps. Can only be used while asleep.

JOKEJOLT.name: Joke Jolt
JOKEJOLT.description: The target is pranked by an electric jolt. They are taunted and unable to use status moves for three turns.

PHOTONEDGE.name: Photon Edge
PHOTONEDGE.description: The user slices with claws of light that have a 50% chance to numb. Critical hits twice as often.

FRANTICFANG.name: Frantic Fang
FRANTICFANG.description: Channeling fear, the user bites the target. Deals double damage if the user is below half health.

TRANQUILTUNE.name: Tranquil Tune
TRANQUILTUNE.description: The target is put to sleep, and the user's Attack is raised. Fails unless the target is at or below half health.

SUGARBALL.name: Sugar Ball
SUGARBALL.description: The user spins sugar into a ball launched at the target. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

SILTSURGE.name: Silt Surge
SILTSURGE.description: The user attacks with a wave of murky water, which hits all near foes and lowers their Speed by two steps.

PLUNDER.name: Plunder
PLUNDER.description: The user attacks the target with a sword. If it faints, tons of money is earned after the battle.

ROYALTRIBUTE.name: Royal Tribute
ROYALTRIBUTE.description: The user demands tribute from the target. Much money is earned after the battle.

SACREDLOTS.name: Sacred Lots
SACREDLOTS.description: The user makes an offering, then attacks two to five times. Money is earned for each hit.

CHACHING.name: Cha-ching
CHACHING.description: The user attacks with the full force of The Market. Much money is earned after the battle.

LEYLINEBURST.name: Leyline Burst
LEYLINEBURST.description: Energy is sent through a conduit, erupting under the target. This move is also Psychic-type.

HARDPLACE.name: Hard Place
HARDPLACE.description: The user slams the target into a nearby hard object. Increases power the higher the Defense of any ally.

DRAGONRIDE.name: Dragon Ride
DRAGONRIDE.description: Doubles target ally's Attack and Speed. However, if the user faints, so too does that ally.

LIKEWILDFIRE.name: Like Wildfire
LIKEWILDFIRE.description: The user roars with the force of a volcano, raising the Attack of itself and allies.

BLAZINGSPEED.name: Blazing Speed
BLAZINGSPEED.description: The user charges the target at blazing-fast speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

ARCHEANDELUGE.name: Archean Deluge
ARCHEANDELUGE.description: Summons rain for five turns on the first turn, then overwhelms the foe with water on the second.

SHIMMERINGHEAT.name: Shimmering Heat
SHIMMERINGHEAT.description: The user attacks with heat, creating an obscuring wall of haze. The user takes 33% less damage this turn.

BREATHELIFE.name: Breathe Life
BREATHELIFE.description: Restores a fainted Grass-type party member to full HP. Only one use per battle.

SPECTRALTONGUE.name: Spectral Tongue
SPECTRALTONGUE.description: The user licks the target, numbing them, or cursing them if they're already numbed.

VICIOUSCLEANING.name: Vicious Cleaning
VICIOUSCLEANING.description: The user flings the dirty oil on its fur. It transfers any status condition to the target.

SEDATINGDUST.name: Sedating Dust
SEDATINGDUST.description: If the user is faster than the target, puts the target to sleep, then minimizes the user's Speed stat.

ODDROOM.name: Odd Room
ODDROOM.description: The user creates an odd area in which Pokémon's offensive and defensive stats are swapped.

MULCHMEAL.name: Mulch Meal
MULCHMEAL.description: The user eats decaying leaves, restoring its HP by 50% and raising its Speed.

GUIDINGAROMA.name: Guiding Aroma
GUIDINGAROMA.description: The user raises all of the target's attacking and defensive stats.

FLAREWITCH.name: Flare Witch
FLAREWITCH.description: Raises Sp. Atk by two steps. Until switch out, the user's attacks spread to hit all nearby foes.

WHIPTRANCE.name: Whip Trance
WHIPTRANCE.description: The user relentlessly attacks with its whip-like hands for three turns. Critical hits twice as often.

CRUELWHIPBLADE.name: Cruel Whipblade
CRUELWHIPBLADE.description: The user flicks its thorns, dealing damage and setting a layer of poison spikes around the target.

HONORLESSSTING.name: Honorless Sting
HONORLESSSTING.description: The user uses venom that turns the target's body against it. Super effective vs Fighting-types.

MURKYFOG.name: Murky Fog
MURKYFOG.description: The user attacks with a pitch black fog. All of the target's stat changes are returned to normal.

SLIMEBALL.name: Slimeball
SLIMEBALL.description: The user attacks with cloying slime, rendering the target's item sticky and unusable.

AUTUMNBLAST.name: Autumn Blast
AUTUMNBLAST.description: The user sheds its leaves to attack. This lowers the user's defensive stats by two steps each.

INCISION.name: Incision
INCISION.description: The user prepares a precise cut. Always a critical hit, but lowers the user's Speed.

VIPERSHOCK.name: Vipershock
VIPERSHOCK.description: The user finishes off its prey. Power is tripled against poisoned targets.

ONAROLL.name: On A Roll
ONAROLL.description: The user attacks while balled up. This counts as a usage of Fury Cutter, Rock Roll, or Snowball.

MACHFLIGHT.name: Mach Flight
MACHFLIGHT.description: The user takes off at sonic speeds, raising its Speed by two steps and gaining the Flying type.

CALTROPARTS.name: Caltrop Arts
CALTROPARTS.description: Defly sets a layer of damaging Spikes around the foe, then switches out.

CULL.name: Cull
CULL.description: The user tries to pick off a weak target. After damage, if the target is below 1/4 HP, they instantly faint.

TRIPLETHREAT.name: Triple Threat
TRIPLETHREAT.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. It has a 20% chance each to numb, burn, or frostbite.

ERODINGFOAM.name: Eroding Foam
ERODINGFOAM.description: The user spews alkaline bubbles that melt the target, drastically lowering their Defense.

COCODROP.name: Coco Drop
COCODROP.description: The user drops some heads from high up. The taller the user compared to the target, the greater the damage.

LIGHTNINGSPEAR.name: Lightning Spear
LIGHTNINGSPEAR.description: Shoots a damaging spear at enemies, or a 4-step Speed-increasing electric charge at allies.

TARVOLLEY.name: Tar Volley
TARVOLLEY.description: The user attacks twice with tar globs. If two targets, the hits spread. Reduces targets' Speed.

WAXINGLIGHT.name: Waxing Light
WAXINGLIGHT.description: Strikes the target with lunar light, then summons moonglow for eight turns.

HEATGYRE.name: Heat Gyre
HEATGYRE.description: Spins into the target while emitting heat, then summons sunshine for eight turns.

MIRRORSHIELD.name: Mirror Shield
MIRRORSHIELD.description: Protects the user from attacks. Special attackers take 1/8th HP damage.

ROUGHTUMBLE.name: Rough & Tumble
ROUGHTUMBLE.description: The user attacks by spreading its body wide. Its power doubles if Curl Up was used previously.

BUILTDIFFERENT.name: Built Different
BUILTDIFFERENT.description: The user flexes its rocky skin, raising its Attack and Defense and gaining the Rock type.

DEATHMARK.name: Death Mark
DEATHMARK.description: The target becomes unable to flee, and takes 50% more damage from all attacks.

BULWARK.name: Bulwark
BULWARK.description: The user and its allies take 50% less attack damage this turn. Always fails if used in succession.

SNOWYSORROWS.name: Snowy Sorrows
SNOWYSORROWS.description: The user incants a snowy curse, dealing damage and setting a layer of frost spikes around the target.

INVITESUN.name: Invite Sun
INVITESUN.description: The user burns the target, then welcomes in sunshine for four turns.

INVITESAND.name: Invite Sand
INVITESAND.description: The user dizzies the target, then summons sandstorm for four turns.

INVITERAIN.name: Invite Rain
INVITERAIN.description: The user numbs the target, then welcomes in rain for four turns.

INVITEHAIL.name: Invite Hail
INVITEHAIL.description: The user frostbites the target, then welcomes in hail for four turns.

HATEFULHAYMAKER.name: Hateful Haymaker
HATEFULHAYMAKER.description: A punch that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

DEFIBRILLATE.name: Defibrillate
DEFIBRILLATE.description: Restores a fainted party member to 1 HP.

ABERRANTMOTE.name: Aberrant Mote
ABERRANTMOTE.description: The user fires a dimensional mote, lowering the target's Sp. Defense.

SINGINGSTONE.name: Singing Stone
SINGINGSTONE.description: The user thrums ominously, lowering the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

THERMALDRAIN.name: Thermal Drain
THERMALDRAIN.description: Drains the heat from the target, restoring HP by half the damage taken by the target.

SILVERSTORM.name: Silver Storm
SILVERSTORM.description: The user creates a nascent ice storm, attacking and causing hail for eight turns.

SHEDCOAT.name: Shed Coat
SHEDCOAT.description: The user sheds excess covering, raising Sp. Atk and Speed by three steps, but lowering Sp. Def by two steps.

FEATHERWARD.name: Feather Ward
FEATHERWARD.description: The user lays a trap of sharp feathers around the foe. It hurts foes that switch into battle.

HYPERJET.name: Hyper Jet
HYPERJET.description: The user swims at the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

DUSTMACHPULSE.name: Dustmach Pulse
DUSTMACHPULSE.description: The user whips up dirt at supersonic speeds, damaging everything around it.

RAMMINGSPEED.name: Ramming Speed
RAMMINGSPEED.description: The user rams its sharp face right into the target. Lowers the user's Speed by three steps.

VOLATILETOXIN.name: Volatile Toxin
VOLATILETOXIN.description: The user injects an unstable toxin into the target. The next Ground-type attack they take deals double damage.

RIGHTEOUSKICK.name: Righteous Kick
RIGHTEOUSKICK.description: A kick that can also eliminate trapping and hazard moves. Also raises user's Speed.

ROOTSHELTER.name: Root Shelter
ROOTSHELTER.description: Halves attack damage taken this turn. Leeches any attackers. Fails if used successively.

DREAMFEAST.name: Dream Feast
DREAMFEAST.description: The user assaults its foe's dreams. It absorbs half the damage dealt, and doubles in power if the foe is asleep.

CRUELKISS.name: Cruel Kiss
CRUELKISS.description: Leeches the target by kissing them with its thin mouth.

TYRANTSFIT.name: Tyrant's Fit
TYRANTSFIT.description: The user throws a royal fit for three turns. Raises Speed if a target is knocked out by this move.

TRANSCENDENTENERGY.name: Transcendent Energy
TRANSCENDENTENERGY.description: A two-turn move. The user channels insane amounts of energy the first turn, then transforms.

TRASHTREASURE.name: Trash Treasure
TRASHTREASURE.description: The target is given a Black Sludge, replacing their item if any. Their Sp. Def is lowered.

PETALTEMPEST.name: Petal Tempest
PETALTEMPEST.description: The user stirs up a violent petal tempest and attacks everything around it.

HEARTRHYTHM.name: Heart Rhythm
HEARTRHYTHM.description: Power increases by 20 each time it's used in succession. User heals for half of damage dealt.

SCALEGLINT.name: Scale Glint
SCALEGLINT.description: The shine from scales damages the target. 20% chance to reduce their higher attacking stat.

REFURBISH.name: Refurbish
REFURBISH.description: The user economizes half of its weight, healing based on the weight lost.

MYSTERYSEED.name: Mystery Seed
MYSTERYSEED.description: The target eats a strange seed. They become numbed if faster than the user, or leeched if slower.

DEPTHCHARGE.name: Depth Charge
DEPTHCHARGE.description: Diving deep on the first turn, the user rises and strikes with explosive strength on second.

SCARRINGSWING.name: Scarring Swing
SCARRINGSWING.description: The user slashes all around them, creating deep scars. This lowers each target's Attack.

HIVEMIND.name: Hive Mind
HIVEMIND.description: The user makes its ally perform the move in the user's first slot.

INNOCENTMASQUE.name: Innocent Masque
INNOCENTMASQUE.description: The target is taunted by a deceptive look. It can't use status moves this or next turn. This move always goes first.

DISSOLUTION.name: Dissolution
DISSOLUTION.description: The user partially dissolves, raising its Sp. Def stat by five steps.

LONGSHOT.name: Long Shot
LONGSHOT.description: Inflicts physical or special damage based on the user's stats. However, it's likely to miss.

DRYHEAT.name: Dry Heat
DRYHEAT.description: The target is dried out and loses Water-type. Then, it bursts into flame from the heat.

ICENINEWALL.name: Ice-Nine Wall
ICENINEWALL.description: Protects the user from attacks. Also frostbites any attacker who physically attacks the user.

VENOMGUARD.name: Venom Guard
VENOMGUARD.description: Halves attack damage taken this turn. Poisons any attackers. Fails if used successively.

PRANK.name: Prank
PRANK.description: The user pranks the target, surprising it and reducing its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps each.

GREYMIST.name: Grey Mist
GREYMIST.description: A Grey Mist covers the battlefield. For five turns, stats are reset at the end of each turn.

PATIENTBLADE.name: Patient Blade
PATIENTBLADE.description: The user prepares its weapons, raising Attack by six steps but lowering Speed by six steps.

ARTOFWAR.name: Art of War
ARTOFWAR.description: The user doubles its critical strike chance and raises its Attack and Defense by two steps each.

REVERBWARD.name: Reverb Ward
REVERBWARD.description: Protects the user from damage this turn. It also lowers the Sp. Def of special attackers by four steps.

MOONGLOW.name: Moonglow
MOONGLOW.description: Summons moonglow for eight turns, boosting Fairy-type attacks and heralding the Full Moon.

ECLIPSE.name: Eclipse
ECLIPSE.description: Summons eclipse for eight turns, boosting Psychic-type attacks and heralding the Total Eclipse.

NIGHTCHILL.name: Night Chill
NIGHTCHILL.description: Damages the target's life force directly. During moonglow, the target also becomes frostbitten.

CALAMITOUSSLASH.name: Calamitous Slash
CALAMITOUSSLASH.description: The user slashes the foe while menacing. During eclipse, the target also becomes burned.

TAKESHELTER.name: Take Shelter
TAKESHELTER.description: The user heals itself for 1/2 of its max HP, and extends the current weather by 1 turn.

BEDTIME.name: Bed Time
BEDTIME.description: The target is lulled to sleep. Can only be used during a Full Moon.

SKYFALL.name: Sky Fall
SKYFALL.description: Attacks while clearing weather. This move fails in the absence of a weather.

HEARTSTOPPER.name: Heartstopper
HEARTSTOPPER.description: For the rest of the round, the healing of all damaged Pokemon is reversed.

IMPURITYBLAZE.name: Impurity Blaze
IMPURITYBLAZE.description: If the target has a status condition, this deals double damage and heals every battler's status condition.

THREEFOLDVOLLEY.name: Threefold Volley
THREEFOLDVOLLEY.description: The user shoots three arrows made of Aura with extreme precision. Critical hits twice as often.

FOXTROTFINALE.name: Foxtrot Finale
FOXTROTFINALE.description: The user raises all of their stats by two steps. Fails unless a foe fainted last turn.

ICEBREAKER.name: Icebreaker
ICEBREAKER.description: The user sweeps away hazards while charging. User also takes 33% recoil.

SCHEME.name: Scheme
SCHEME.description: The user schemes to raise its Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps. During moonglow, also raises Speed by two steps.

SHININGSHELL.name: Shining Shell
SHININGSHELL.description: Protects the user from damage this turn. It also lowers the Sp. Atk of special attackers by two steps.

SPIKYBURST.name: Spiky Burst
SPIKYBURST.description: Explodes, dealing an extra 50 base power to all foes for each layer of spikes underneath them. The user faints.

MALEFACTION.name: Malefaction
MALEFACTION.description: The user swaps out using a cruel illusion. This move always goes last.

HAIRCURL.name: Hair Curl
HAIRCURL.description: The user curls its metal hair around the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

MEGALITHRITE.name: Megalith Rite
MEGALITHRITE.description: The user calls all rocks to join it, summoning sandstorm for five turns and laying a trap of levitating stones around the target.

CONTRADICT.name: Contradict
CONTRADICT.description: The user questions the existence of the target, dealing psychic damage and dizzying them.

MOUTHFUL.name: Mouthful
MOUTHFUL.description: The user chomps hard, cutting the target's HP by half, and healing for half of that.

OMNISHELTER.name: Omnishelter
OMNISHELTER.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks this turn, and enemies can only target the user. Fails if used in succession.

HYPERFROST.name: Hyperfrost
HYPERFROST.description: The user freezes the target in place, dealing damage and minimizing their Speed and evasiveness.

EVERHONE.name: Everhone
EVERHONE.description: Inflicts physical or special damage, whichever deals more. Then, raises the attacking stat which wasn't used.

METAFORM.name: Metaform
METAFORM.description: The user finds the highest base power move among your able party members, and uses it.

ARCHMYTH.name: Archmyth
ARCHMYTH.description: Invokes the aspects of multiple dragons, striking with two fitting moves in a row.

CAPOEIRA.name: Capoeira
CAPOEIRA.description: Combining dance and martial art, the user strikes the target and raises its Speed by two steps.

SMOLDERRAVE.name: Smolder Rave
SMOLDERRAVE.description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances wildly, raising its Sp. Atk by two steps.

WETLANDWALTZ.name: Wetland Waltz
WETLANDWALTZ.description: The user attacks the target using graceful fluid movements, also forming an Aqua Ring around themselves.

ABSOLUTERADIANCE.name: Absolute Radiance
ABSOLUTERADIANCE.description: Summons sun for five turns on the first turn, then overwhelms the foe with fiery light on the second.

MAGNETIZE.name: Magnetize
MAGNETIZE.description: The user strikes the target while magnetizing it, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

FARADAYCAGE.name: Faraday Cage
FARADAYCAGE.description: Conductive materials ensnare the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

MAGEHAND.name: Mage Hand
MAGEHAND.description: The user grabs the target with a conjured hand, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

KINETICGRIP.name: Kinetic Grip
KINETICGRIP.description: The user conjures a giant fist to crush the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

LIFTOFF.name: Liftoff
LIFTOFF.description: The user launches up high, then explodes down on the second turn, taking 25% recoil.

ICYINJECTION.name: Icy Injection
ICYINJECTION.description: Injects supercold liquid into the target, damaging them and halving all future healing.

DIVINATION.name: Divination
DIVINATION.description: The user restores 1/2 of their HP and raises their Defense, Sp. Def, and critical hit chance by two steps each.

WINTEROPS.name: Winter Ops
WINTEROPS.description: The user hunts with its allies. The more party Pokémon, the more damage. Critical hits twice as often.

GRIMVISIONS.name: Grim Visions
GRIMVISIONS.description: The user attacks with dark illusions. This also lowers the target's Defense stat by two steps.

SILKBLADE.name: Silk Blade
SILKBLADE.description: The user slashes using woven silk, lowering the user's Attack by four steps. Critical hits twice as often.

EXTREMEEFFORT.name: Extreme Effort
EXTREMEEFFORT.description: The user uses all their might to attack their opponent, forcing the user to use Rest on their next turn.

MANYBLESSINGS.name: Many Blessings
MANYBLESSINGS.description: The user doubles its critical strike chance and raises its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps each.

MACHINATE.name: Machinate
MACHINATE.description: Changes type based on machine haunted. 30% chance of extra effect based on machine haunted.

BANISH.name: Banish
BANISH.description: The user dismisses the target, forcing it to switch out.

CHECKMATE.name: Checkmate
CHECKMATE.description: If the target is the last able member of their party, this attack's power is doubled.

WEATHERBURST.name: Weather Burst
WEATHERBURST.description: Type based on weather. Inflicts physical or special damage based on the user's stats.

SHINESHOT.name: Shine Shot
SHINESHOT.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It has a 30% chance to lower Sp. Def.

TUTELAGE.name: Tutelage
TUTELAGE.description: The user imparts knowledge on its ally Pokémon, raising their Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats by two steps.

SWEETSELENE.name: Sweet Selene
SWEETSELENE.description: The user restores 1/2 of its HP, or 2/3rds in moonglow.

GEMSEAL.name: Gem Seal
GEMSEAL.description: Disables the target's last used move for five turns, and cuts 5 PP from it.

RIVERREST.name: River Rest
RIVERREST.description: The user rests in a riverbed, restoring its HP by half of max, and forming an Aqua Ring around itself.

WHALESONG.name: Whale Song
WHALESONG.description: The user's song heals the status problems of all the party Pokémon, and forms an Aqua Ring around itself.

DEEPBREATHING.name: Deep Breathing
DEEPBREATHING.description: The user breathes deeply, raising its Speed by four steps and quadrupling its critical hit chance.

ANGELSKISS.name: Angel's Kiss
ANGELSKISS.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that dizzies the target.

MISTBURST.name: Mist Burst
MISTBURST.description: Attacks nearby foes with a misty explosion. User is damaged for 50% of their current HP.

ENERGYTRICK.name: Energy Trick
ENERGYTRICK.description: The user employs psychic power to switch its base Sp. Atk with its base Sp. Def stat.

JETSTREAM.name: Jet Stream
JETSTREAM.description: The user whips up a lingering tailwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for six turns.

STABILIZE.name: Stabilize
STABILIZE.description: The user slathers mud around to heal itself for 1/2 of its max HP, and extends any active screens by 1 turn.

THIEVINGSPREE.name: Thieving Spree
THIEVINGSPREE.description: The user attacks and steals items from all near foes. Items stolen from wild Pokémon are stored.

TERRORSWARM.name: Terror Swarm
TERRORSWARM.description: The user summons bugs to terrorize the target, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

BLIGHT.name: Blight
BLIGHT.description: The user infects the target with a touch and also destroys any Herbs its holding.

DETACHMENT.name: Detachment
DETACHMENT.description: The user attacks freed from earthly attachments. Doubles in damage if the user has no item when the move starts.

SWARMORDER.name: Swarm Order
SWARMORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Skips and destroys protections.

NOISEORDER.name: Noise Order
NOISEORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to annoy the target with buzzing sounds, dizzying it.

REGALIA.name: Regalia
REGALIA.description: The user adorns itself or the target with precious stones, changing it to your choice of Fairy, Dragon, or Steel-type.

ROLLINGARSENAL.name: Rolling Arsenal
ROLLINGARSENAL.description: The user bites, claws, and stings the target while rolling. It has a 20% chance each to poison, dizzy, or leech.

INFINITEWING.name: Infinite Wing
INFINITEWING.description: The user flies up to raise its Sp. Def by four steps in the first turn, then rams the foe on the second.

SWAGGER.name: Swagger
SWAGGER.description: The target's Attack stat is raised by three steps. It then hits itself in a rage.

FLATTER.name: Flatter
FLATTER.description: The target's Sp. Atk stat is raised by three steps. It then hurts itself in its mental turmoil.

SHELLTER.name: Shellter
SHELLTER.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising both defensive stats by two steps and gaining Shell Armor.

TUNEUP.name: Tune Up
TUNEUP.description: The user amps itself up for performance, raising its Sp. Atk and Speed by two steps each.

HONESIGHT.name: Hone Sight
HONESIGHT.description: The user focuses its aim to raise its Sp. Atk and accuracy by three steps each.

CURSEDOATH.name: Cursed Oath
CURSEDOATH.description: The user loses 1/4th of their max HP to curse the target, damaging their HP by 1/4th each turn.

MINDSAP.name: Mind Sap
MINDSAP.description: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat, then restores its own HP by the target's Sp. Atk.

CLASSICALPHYSICS.name: Classical Physics
CLASSICALPHYSICS.description: An apple falls from high up to strike the foe. Always goes first. Deals double damage in intense Gravity.

STARDANCE.name: Star Dance
STARDANCE.description: The user dazzles the target with celestial visions that lowers its Sp. Atk stat by five steps.

AMPUP.name: Amp Up
AMPUP.description: The user assists an ally's next move, boosting its power by 50% and letting it move right after the user.

ANATMAN.name: Anatman
ANATMAN.description: The user meditates, raising both its Attack and Sp. Atk stats by four steps each.

UNDYINGRUSH.name: Undying Rush
UNDYINGRUSH.description: Clad in souls, the user crashes into the target. The user takes 33% recoil, but can't faint from it.

VERMINCLOUD.name: Vermin Cloud
VERMINCLOUD.description: The user transforms into a cloud of vermin, evading all attacks on the first turn. On the second turn it ambushes the target.

ICEDUNGEON.name: Ice Dungeon
ICEDUNGEON.description: The user imprisons all near foes, reducing their attacking stats by one step each and trapping them until the next time they take a hit.

BAR.name: Bar
BAR.description: The target is barred by rules which prevent it from using off-type moves for three more turns.

OCCULTATION.name: Occultation
OCCULTATION.description: Attacks all near others with dragon energy. Power increases by 50% in eclipse.

AIMTRUE.name: Aim True
AIMTRUE.description: The user steadies its eyes, mind, and body in order to maximize its accuracy.

STAMPDOWN.name: Stamp Down
STAMPDOWN.description: The user attacks by flattening the target into the ground. The target's stat step changes are returned to normal.

GRINDSTONE.name: Grind Stone
GRINDSTONE.description: The user scratches the target with rough rocks. If in sandstorm, the target's Defense is lowered by three steps.

ERODE.name: Erode
ERODE.description: Attacks by blasting sand. This move always goes first in sandstorm.

HEARTHFIREHULA.name: Hearthfire Hula
HEARTHFIREHULA.description: The user dances rapidly, emitting tropical heat. Any frostbitten Pokémon will be healed by this heat.

CURLUP.name: Curl Up
CURLUP.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise both of its defensive stats.

MORNINGSTAR.name: Morningstar
MORNINGSTAR.description: The user invokes forbidden celestial powers to smite the target.

FIREPULSE.name: Fire Pulse
FIREPULSE.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of fire. It has a 20% chance to burn.

TEPHRACANNON.name: Tephra Cannon
TEPHRACANNON.description: The user launches volcanic debris, dealing damage and setting a layer of flame spikes around the target.

STORMDRIVE.name: Storm Drive
STORMDRIVE.description: The user charges, then attacks on the second turn. Charges instantly in Rain.

MANYNEEDLE.name: Manyneedle
MANYNEEDLE.description: The foe is stabbed once by each of the user's stingers.

RISINGTIDE.name: Rising Tide
RISINGTIDE.description: Strikes the target with harbor waters, then summons rain for eight turns.

EXSANGUINATE.name: Exsanguinate
EXSANGUINATE.description: The user steals blood, lowering the target's Attack. If so, raises the user's Attack.

GLEEFULGRASP.name: Gleeful Grasp
GLEEFULGRASP.description: The user indulges its love of battle by striking a foe. Both of the user's attacking stats are raised.

PLAYBITE.name: Play Bite
PLAYBITE.description: The user bites with playful abandon. This deals double damage on the user's first turn out.

DESTRIERSWHIM.name: Destrier's Whim
DESTRIERSWHIM.description: The user burns the target if they're a foe, or raises their Speed by four steps if they're an ally.

JOUST.name: Joust
JOUST.description: The user charges at the target to strike it squarely. If it misses, the user's accuracy and Speed is raised.

SEASONSEND.name: Season's End
SEASONSEND.description: The user strikes while inviting the power of seasons. The user changes form to the next season.

SCALESCATTER.name: Scale Scatter
SCALESCATTER.description: The target is plastered with irritating scales, damaging it and changing its type to Bug.

THORNRATTLE.name: Thorn Rattle
THORNRATTLE.description: The user makes a scary sound by shaking, forcing the target to switch out.

CROSSEXAMINE.name: Cross Examine
CROSSEXAMINE.description: The user chooses between the three most recent moves used by the opposing team, and uses that move themselves.

GENOTHEOSIS.name: Genotheosis
GENOTHEOSIS.description: The user psychically modifies its own genes, transforming into either Overmatter form or Overmind form.

AURORAFLASH.name: Aurora Flash
AURORAFLASH.description: An aurora borealis flashes brightly at the target, lowering their Attack. Always goes first.

SPLITTHESKY.name: Split the Sky
SPLITTHESKY.description: An electrified cloud zaps the target, lowering their Speed. This has a 50% chance to flinch.

PROMINENCE.name: Prominence
PROMINENCE.description: A lance of fire pierces the target from above, lowering their Sp. Atk. Critical hits four times as often.

ICICLEPIN.name: Icicle Pin
ICICLEPIN.description: The user pins the target down with icy spikes, applying frostbite and making it unable to flee.

HEADTHROW.name: Head Throw
HEADTHROW.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike three times in a row.

ROTARYHEADBUTT.name: Rotary Headbutt
ROTARYHEADBUTT.description: The user hits the target with each of its heads from underground. Strikes three times.

DIAMONDFIELD.name: Diamond Field
DIAMONDFIELD.description: A diamond-tough force-field protects the user's side for 5 turns from critical hits and reduces damage against them.

LUCKYCHEER.name: Lucky Cheer
LUCKYCHEER.description: The user dances to encourage its ally. Their attacks this turn will be critical hits.

HEALTHYCHEER.name: Healthy Cheer
HEALTHYCHEER.description: The user dances to restore an ally by 50% max HP. They're cured of any status conditions.

DEATHKNELL.name: Death Knell
DEATHKNELL.description: The user makes a dreadful bell noise, harming all near battlers with visions of impending doom.

GHOULISHGALE.name: Ghoulish Gale
GHOULISHGALE.description: The target is blasted with an unsettling wind. Can't miss and skips protections.

CURSEDROOTS.name: Cursed Roots
CURSEDROOTS.description: The user spends 25% HP to lay down evil roots. This curses all foes. The user becomes trapped, but heals by 1/8th HP every turn.

MUDSLIDE.name: Mud Slide
MUDSLIDE.description: The user rides onto the field on a huge wave of mud, damaging all nearby and raising their own Speed.

BUTTINGHEADS.name: Butting Heads
BUTTINGHEADS.description: The user engages the target in a head-to-head fight. The damage is based on the target's Attack rather than their Defense.

PACKAGE.name: Package
PACKAGE.description: The user throws an exploding package at enemies, or one filled with healing treats at allies.

SAPPINGSEED.name: Sapping Seed
SAPPINGSEED.description: A parasitic seed leeches the target and reduces both its attacking stats.

MIDNIGHTHUNT.name: Midnight Hunt
MIDNIGHTHUNT.description: Summons moonglow for eight turns and raises the Attack stat of itself and its allies by two steps.

LUMINOUSBURST.name: Luminous Burst
LUMINOUSBURST.description: Cloaking itself in light energy, the user shocks the target, raising the user's Sp. Def by two steps.

FIGHTFOREVER.name: Fight Forever
FIGHTFOREVER.description: The user endures attacks with 1 HP. If so, raises its Attack by two steps. Fails if used in succession.

TIDALKINESIS.name: Tidalkinesis
TIDALKINESIS.description: The user bites with added telekinetic force. During eclipse, the target also becomes numbed.

MUTATE.name: Mutate
MUTATE.description: The user mutates its genetic code, transforming into any of its 3 other forms. Only useable as Deoxys Normal.

GUTCHECK.name: Gut Check
GUTCHECK.description: The user attacks with courage. Sets spikes if Full. If Hangry, deals double damage and is Dark-type.

SHATTERVISE.name: Shatter Vise
SHATTERVISE.description: The user crushes the target in its metallic vises, trapping and damaging it for three turns.

WAVEOFJADE.name: Wave of Jade
WAVEOFJADE.description: The user emits a wave of green energy to strike near foes. Deals double damage to those slower than the user.

GLIMMERPULSE.name: Glimmer Pulse
GLIMMERPULSE.description: The user harms the target with gemlike light. Deals double damage if the user has used a gem this battle.

BUBBLEBARRAGE.name: Bubble Barrage
BUBBLEBARRAGE.description: The user creates two to five giant bubbles to explode against the target.

PULSAR.name: Pulsar
PULSAR.description: The user sends two to five waves of cosmic energy to overwhelm the target's senses.

SEANCE.name: Seance
SEANCE.description: The user summons two to five apparitions that dance around hypnotically before striking.

FIREWORKS.name: Fireworks
FIREWORKS.description: The user fires off two to five explosive rounds in a beautiful display.

RAPIDHERTZ.name: Rapid Hertz
RAPIDHERTZ.description: The target is hit with an electric current two to five times in quick succession. Has a 10% chance to numb.

AXETOGRIND.name: Axe to Grind
AXETOGRIND.description: The user attacks fueled by ire. Deals double damage if it's a critical hit.

IMPALINGSPIKE.name: Impaling Spike
IMPALINGSPIKE.description: A large spike is shot at the target. If this causes the target to faint, a layer of spikes is set on the ground beneath them.

YOUNGAGAIN.name: Young Again
YOUNGAGAIN.description: The user conjures up the past, transforming the target into their previous evolutionary form.

PULVERIZERCHORD.name: Pulverizer Chord
PULVERIZERCHORD.description: The user hits a pitch that turns earth and stone to dust, damaging its foes.

WINDTUNNEL.name: Wind Tunnel
WINDTUNNEL.description: Wind rapidly spins the target in place to hit them two to five times. Has a 10% chance to dizzy.

SUCKBLOOD.name: Suck Blood
SUCKBLOOD.description: The user leeches the target's life. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

VOLLEY.name: Volley
VOLLEY.description: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe with aerial projectiles.

DRONING.name: Droning
DRONING.description: The user vibrates its wings to make a damaging sound wave. It has a 30% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

DROWN.name: Drown
DROWN.description: Disables the target's last used move for four turns, then reduces a relevant stat on them by four steps.

DEVOURWHOLE.name: Devour Whole
DEVOURWHOLE.description: Grips the target with its entire mouth. The user can't attack next turn unless the target faints or switches out.

SPOTTING.name: Spotting
SPOTTING.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power and accuracy of its next attack by 50%.

REPULSIONFIELD.name: Repulsion Field
REPULSIONFIELD.description: This move creates a directional magnetic field which reduces damage from attacks with 100 or more base power for five turns.

MASQUERBLADE.name: Masquerblade
MASQUERBLADE.description: The user hides its blade. If it is hit by a special move, it unsheathes it quickly, slashing all near foes.

VAINGLORYFLAMES.name: Vainglory Flames
VAINGLORYFLAMES.description: A distinguished attack that motivates nearby allies to follow, letting them act immediately after

COLDSHOULDER.name: Cold Shoulder
COLDSHOULDER.description: The user attacks with bitter emotion. This lowers the target's attacking stats by two steps if in hail.

DISTURB.name: Disturb
DISTURB.description: The target is subjected to a violent and frightening prank. It has a 10% chance to numb.

BALEFULBOP.name: Baleful Bop
BALEFULBOP.description: The user sings with reckless abandon, annoying the target. There's a 30% chance they become dizzy.

BUBBLEBARRIER.name: Bubble Barrier
BUBBLEBARRIER.description: The user creates a bubble to shield their ally. The next time they’re hit, 50% of the move damage is instead dealt back as recoil.

ROCKETPUNCH.name: Rocket Punch
ROCKETPUNCH.description: The user launches a fist with extreme force. This attack is popular with children.

PRISMATICPOWER.name: Prismatic Power
PRISMATICPOWER.description: The user expresses a hidden potential. Changes type to match the user's Gem, Plate, or Crystal Veil.

CAPACITYBURST.name: Capacity Burst
CAPACITYBURST.description: The user surges with electricity. If it deals less than 50% of the target's max health, the user takes the difference as recoil.

WELD.name: Weld
WELD.description: Welds heavy steel onto the target, giving it the Steel type and reducing its Speed by four steps.

BADENDING.name: Bad Ending
BADENDING.description: For the rest of the round, the target's healing is reversed. Always goes first.

DISCOURAGE.name: Discourage
DISCOURAGE.description: The user forces the target to switch out, to be replaced at random. In the wild, the battle ends.

DRAFT.name: Draft
DRAFT.description: The user sends a chilly wind towards the target. This has a 10% chance to frostbite.

GUTTURALROAR.name: Guttural Roar
GUTTURALROAR.description: The user shakes the target with a deep, rumbling roar. This attack does physical damage.

CENTER.name: Center
CENTER.description: The user concentrates to stabilize its mood. It raises the user's Sp. Def by three steps.

CONCENTRATE.name: Concentrate
CONCENTRATE.description: The user stimulates its brain by planning. It raises the user's Sp. Atk by three steps.

RIPTIDE.name: Rip Tide
RIPTIDE.description: The user crashes into the target on a ripping current. This raises the user's Speed by two steps.

HOP.name: Hop
HOP.description: The user hops high up to land on the target's head. It has a 10% chance to dizzy.

RISINGPOWER.name: Rising Power
RISINGPOWER.description: Has 10 more base power for each raised stat step. Inflicts physical or special damage based on the user's stats.

SHARINGSMILES.name: Sharing Smiles
SHARINGSMILES.description: The user and the target each share their highest stat step with the other.

HOTSHOT.name: Hot Shot
HOTSHOT.description: The user shoots the target with a small bolt of fire. This move always goes first.

GLAMOURFLASH.name: Glamour Flash
GLAMOURFLASH.description: The user flashes colorful light to damage the target. This move always goes first.

POISONDART.name: Poison Dart
POISONDART.description: The user shoots the target with a dart made of poison. This move always goes first.

DREAD.name: Dread
DREAD.description: The user inspires a sudden dread in the target, damaging it. This move always goes first.

GLOAT.name: Gloat
GLOAT.description: The user raises all of their stats by two steps. Fails unless a foe is below half health.

BULLY.name: Bully
BULLY.description: This attack deals 50 percent more damage if the target has any raised or lowered stat steps.

FIREFOREFFECT.name: Fire For Effect
FIREFOREFFECT.description: The user chooses Fire, Electric, or Ice, then launches a shell of that type to strike the target in one turn.

SNAP.name: Snap
SNAP.description: The user snaps like a fish at the target. This has a 40% chance to make it flinch.

BREACH.name: Breach
BREACH.description: The user jumps out of the water to attack. Has a 20% chance to reduce Defense.

POLARIZEDROOM.name: Polarized Room
POLARIZEDROOM.description: The user creates a high quality area in which super-effective deals 25% more, and not very effective deals 25% less.

MISTLETOE.name: Mistletoe
MISTLETOE.description: The user uses their feet to pierce the foe. This has a 10% chance of leeching the target.

ROOTDRIVER.name: Root Driver
ROOTDRIVER.description: The user kicks into the target like roots into earth. This has a 30% chance of leeching.

WHIPKICK.name: Whip Kick
WHIPKICK.description: The user whips their legs into the target like a plant. This has a 10% chance of leeching.

SIEGEBREAKER.name: Siege Breaker
SIEGEBREAKER.description: The user slams the target with a rocky blade. Destroys screens, substitute, and protection on the target.

ALLFORONE.name: All For One
ALLFORONE.description: The user slashes with gusto, inspiring its allies to follow up by using Slash on the target.

BLADESOFGRASS.name: Blades of Grass
BLADESOFGRASS.description: The user gracefully slashes the target three times. The next time this move is used, it will hit one extra time.

SCYTHEKICK.name: Scythe Kick
SCYTHEKICK.description: The user kicks the target with a powerful, arcing technique.

RAZINGVINES.name: Razing Vines
RAZINGVINES.description: Attacks while destroying rooms. This move fails in the absence of a room.

CRANIALGUARD.name: Cranial Guard
CRANIALGUARD.description: Protects the user from damage this turn. The user will counter with Granite Head if attacked.

FROMBEYOND.name: From Beyond
FROMBEYOND.description: The user channels its fallen allies to strike the target. This attack has 20 more power per fainted party member.

SIROCCO.name: Sirocco
SIROCCO.description: Hits the target with a sandy wind, then summons sandstorm for eight turns.

HONEYSLATHER.name: Honey Slather
HONEYSLATHER.description: The user uses honey to fully restore their HP. However, this lures swarming insects, trapping and damaging the user for three turns.

PARADISIACA.name: Paradisiaca
PARADISIACA.description: The user shapes primal clay to heal a nearby ally for their max HP. This can overheal. The user must recharge next turn.

GREATERGLORIES.name: Greater Glories
GREATERGLORIES.description: The user channels ancient energy to grant a nearby ally an extra turn this round.

HEAVENSEYES.name: Heaven's Eyes
HEAVENSEYES.description: The user's eyes glow with divine judgement, numbing the target and reducing both its attacking stats.

QUARANTINE.name: Quarantine
QUARANTINE.description: Protects the user's side from status moves this turn. It disables any moves blocked for three turns.

STINKCOVER.name: Stink Cover
STINKCOVER.description: The foe is forced is forced to switch out by a stinky cloud, then the user also switches. Always goes last.

FLORALGRAMARYE.name: Floral Gramarye
FLORALGRAMARYE.description: A patch of medicinal flowers sprouts across the battlefield. This heals every Pokémon for 1/8th HP each turn for five turns.

DISCOVEREDPOWER.name: Discovered Power
DISCOVEREDPOWER.description: The user ponders ancient wisdom, selecting three random status moves. You choose which one it uses.

SHIVERSQUIRM.name: Shiver Squirm
SHIVERSQUIRM.description: The user flips, flaps, fumbles, then flounders. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

GRUNGE.name: Grunge
GRUNGE.description: The user creates distorted guitar sounds to attack the target. It has a 30% chance to dizzy.

PENUMBRA.name: Penumbra
PENUMBRA.description: Psychic energy assaults the foe and darkens the sky, summoning eclipse for 8 turns.
